Ba' aapi'm jiñ jaaduñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan na pim bar maamra'n gu Dios , nat gɇ'kam kɨ'n xi jam joi'ndak jam a'm tɨ tɨɨ , jam a'm jum aa' na pim bɨɨx jam jujur kɨ'n tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhat jix biiñak ka' buiñor guch Xoi'kam . Gu Dios pu kai'ñkam pɨx bha joot na ya' pui' ba ji buusanda' na jax gu ja gɇ'kam tuk gui' nam bhai' gɇ' chiop ja palhbui'ñdha' gu ja'tkam nam tu daanda' buiñor gu Dios .

Gio aapi'm jañ bɨɨx pui'p tu jam a'gi'ñdha' na pim pu'ñi tu juanda' gio na pim siamri xi ja maakidhat gui' nam cham bia'ka' nam tu' kɨ'n tu saba'da' , pui' pim xim aagɨt nat pɨn jax tɨ'ɨɨk gu Gɇ'kam jich Xoi'kam na saak jix io'm jix abhaaruix no'ñ pu'ñi tu' nañ pɨx ja maakim gu ja'tkam , cham pui' na jax no'm ja'kbui' kat tuñ maak .

Gio ba' jam guguuxi'ñ iñ ɨp na pim cham jir ganai' pɨx ka' . Cha'pim jai'x bhai' ja tɨtdadat ja bɨɨm boppoda' gu u'uub , dai ji gui' na pim maap tɨɨmui'x na jax tu daaxix . Na gu' pui' pɨx jam tɨɨda' gu Dios jano' na pai' dhuuk tum kuugalhdha' ya' dhi oi'ñga'n na pim jix u'ua'tulhdhix no' pim pu'ñi jai'x bhai' ja tɨtda gu u'uub . Ba' pui' xi jam tɨɨdai mu ja'k xi chu chiñia' nam jam iabu' na pim pai' gammɨjɨ mi' pup mɨɨjidha' .
Ku gu' cham tu' mu baa ji mɨjɨ ɨrban dɨr , mi' dhɨr pɨx dɨɨrap dumaalh jum tɨkaak mui' xi chɨ nɨi'ñ mɨjɨ na mɨt pai' tɨɨ . Cham pai' tu jai'ch , dai gu jajannulh mi bɨɨt na kɨ'n bhiibgich .
Ba' mi' dhɨr bhai' ji chɨm bɨpgɨ bha ja'p jix dhaam , gio nat gɇ' kɨ'n bhai' ji chɨm tɨr , gam nat jix io'm bhai' ji gi'ndokɨ gu oi'ñga'n , na cham pai' dhuuk pu'ñi pɨk jix io'm joiñdhat .

Ba' aañ na ñich jax jiñ o'lhia kɨ'n kɨkbo , ba ji chu daanɨ ñich buiñor gu nobii'ñ gu Dios na mi' tuñ a'gi'ñ , gu' ji na gu' gui'p jiñ chɨtda : ― Cha'p tu daanda' aañ jiñ bui , nañ gu' aañ pur cham tu' . Jir tujuandam tugi'ñ iñ pɨx gu Dios ja'p na jax aap jiñ jaduuñ gio gu jai' nam jɨ'k tu' ka'm nɨidhat mi' pui' ba jiim na jax chum a'ga gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñi'ook na bhaan tu a'ga guch Xoi'kam . Gui' ji Dios nap xi dhañia' . Na gu' bɨɨx nam jɨ'k bhaankamu'n tu a'ga gu Dios , bɨɨx ja jujur kɨ'n ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ am na jax jum kai'ch gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñi'ook na bhaan tu a'ga guch Xoi'kam .

Ba' aach nach jɨ'k buiñor ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ guch Xoi'kam , gu Dios bhaankam gux Dhuudu' kam jix Uañ Ii'mdaga'n jich aagi'ñ dhi' nat tu'ch bi' pu bɨjɨk . Na gu' gux Dhuudu' kam jix Uañ Ii'mda' no'ñ a'm bap tui'dhi' , bɨɨx tuñ aagi'ñdha' , sia ku panaas jix xijai gu tu' nañ jix maatɨt kaaya' .

Joidham japim jix bhai'm ɨlhdhai aichdha' na bhammɨ ba aaya' , ja'p japim ɨlhdha' na jax gu mia'n jam jaduuñ , na gu' pui'p tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam . Jix io'm japim tu' ka'm ja nɨidhat jix ja joi'gɨ'nda' gui' nam pu'ñi ja'k tu jimda' na jax dhi' .

Ba' aapi'm na pim tɨ gɨgɨ'kora' , tu' ka'm japim xi ja nɨidhat gu jam tataat gio gu jam nanaan , sia na pim jir a'aalh , piam ku pim jir biipibop , piam ku pim jir gɇ'gɇr ja'tkam , na gu' pui' ja'k jix aa' guch Xoi'kam .

Aach cham tu'x buam jum duukam jup tu duñiim jiñ jaaduñ nach xich ga'nga , jix bhai'ch chaat ich ba' . Mi' pui' jiim ich gu' na jax ja'k jum aa' nach mi' pui' jiimda' nach ya' ka oipo dhi oi'ñga'n bhaan , pui' na jax aapi'm nach gu' cham tu' tu' bhaan jax jam tɨtda ku pim gu' bhaan jix buam jup bam aa' . Gio nach gu' cham tu' pui' ja'k jujurtɨk na jax gu ja'tkam ya' kam dhi oi'ñga'n , gu' ja'pji na jax ja'k jix aa' gu Dios na jaroi' xich joi'mdat jich ñɨidhim .

Na gu' gu jaroi' no't jiñ kɇɇk mi' pui' ba jii nañ jɨ'k jax jam tɨtda , dhi' bhaan bax maatɨ' ka' na sɨlhkam jix aa' na tu' ka'm jiñ ñɨidhat ba xiñ kɨɨgalhi'ñdha' gammɨjɨ , mi' dhɨr ba'x bhai' bhai' ji machia' nañ jir tu'p tu'm da' , gio ba' nax joi'ndat ba tɨgia' guñ Gɨ'kora' no' pu'ñi mi' pui' ba jim nañ jɨ'k jax tu a'ga .

Tɨi dhor am ɨp pui' nam jax kai'chdha' , nam gu' tu ja aagi'ñdha' nam jax ja'k soi'm ɨlhii'ñdha' gu ja'tkam gio nam jax ja'k jix bhai' tu jimda' . Ja aagi'ñdha' am nam tulhiiñchuda' gu ja tutku' na ba'x bhai' tu ja jimia' , gu' pɨx ji na gu' dhi' pui' ja'k cham jɨ'xkat jich palhbuidha' nach jax ja'k dui nakga' nach bɨɨx aixim jix buam jix chu duñiik ka'ch chutku' bhaan .

Dhi'm ba' ya ja'p pui' ba tu a'gim nap jax jir tu'm kam jiñ jaduuñ , nap sap pu'ñi joidham jix ja joi'ndat jix bhai' ja buada' na mɨt jɨ'kim bhai' ba ai jum ki'aam . Bɨɨx jam pui' bax chu maat gu ya' kam jich Xoi'kam jɨɨgi'ñdham . Ba' aañ jum guguuxi'ñ jiñ jaduuñ nap siamri pu'ñix bhai' xi ja bua't guñ jaaduñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan no'm bhai' aajim jum ki'aam , xi ja palhbuidhat ap kɨ'n gu tu' na ja a'm jum aagaidha' , na gu' pu'ñi ja'k jix kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ gu Dios .
Cha'p mi ja bɨpnatdat gui' nam dai ñiokboda' bɨxchu' bhaan ji chu a'gat na pu cham tu' mim nɨnɨi'ñ , na gu' dhi' dai gu bhaamdara' tu ua'pu nap jax bax maat .

Pui' na jax aach na gu' cham tu' tu' kach iiñ guch buibas , pui' pɨx ba' maaxik gɇ' tanoor ich , na gu'ch a'm jum maaxi'ñ gu Dios na jax jir tu'm kam . Gammɨjɨch jix io'm pui'ch dhuñiim na jax jir tu'm kam gu Dios , na gu'ch Xoi'kam pɨx nap tu duiñchu' , na gu'r dhi' pɨx gux Dhuudu' kam jix Uañ Ii'mda' .

Gu' gi ba' gu ɨ'ra'n guch Xoi'kam nax io'm jir gɇ'p jum duukam , pu gammɨjɨ ji nat ba tuch uañ gu Dios guch ua'tulhdhara' nat pai' dhuuk makgɨrxi guch Xoi'kam . Gux Dhuudu' kam jix Uañ Ii'mda' na gammɨjɨ bhaan tajaañixchu'ndat guch Xoi'kam guguux nach a'mkam jum makgɨrta' buiñor gu Dios , na cham tu' bhaan ua'tulhdhix , na ba' pu'ñi duuji dappaam tuch uañdhix ka' guch ua'tulhdhara' . Ba' aach dai nach kaichgɨt gammɨjɨ mi' pui' ba jiimda' na jax jix aa' guch Gɨ'kora' na gammɨjɨ pur Dios .

Gu' ba' no' gu' gu Dios dɨɨlh jup bax ja maakim gui' nam cham jir Israel kam ja'tkam gu pu chu'm nat jax chu'm jich maa aach jano' na chich pai' dhuuk tɨ jɨɨ'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam , ¿ jax jañ bia' nañ jup ba ji chɨ'ya' aañ , nañ gu' cham jir jupaabkamu'n gu Dios ?

na gu' gux Dhuudu' kam jix Uañ Ii'mda' pui'x buam jup jum aa'nda' no' pim jix buam tu ñiok . Jum aa' ba' na pim cham jix buam tu ñiokda' . Dhix Dhuudu' kam jix Uañ Ii'mda' gu' na jam a'm tajaañix , ja'p ji buusan nat dhi' kɨ'n jam matgilh gu Dios na ba' dhi' bhaan jix maatɨt jam tɨgia' ɨp gio gatuuk na pim aapi'm cham tu' mu ja'k bhɨɨya' na pim pai' gammɨjɨ mi' pup jum tulhiiñdha' .

Siamri pim moo mi' pui' xi jimɨi na jɨ'k jax jix aa' gu Dios , ja'p na pim jax ja'k tui'ñgɨt moo jano' na pimɨt jax tɨ jɨɨ'ñ aañ jiñ bui na pim joidham bɨɨx jam jujur kɨ'n tu' ka'm jiñ ñɨidhat . Soi' pim bam ɨlhdha' ɨp gio , cha'pim kooksɨt darka' . Na gu' no' pim aapi'm cham tu'p jum buixdhat am ɨrdat oipo , cham tu' jam baidhika' iñ bhammɨ ja'k nat pai' tu jam iimchuda gu Dios na saak jam aichdha' , nañ gu' aañ jotmoda' pɨx mi' pɨx ba kɨɨka' cham jum ɨlhdham nañ pai' dhuuk mu jimda' . Pu cham jaroi' mat ka' na pai' dhuuk , ja'p na jax ba' gu jax chu'm jix ɨxkum pai' no't ba tu o'bhai' jax chu'm ba'k chɨr na tɨ ɨɨxdha' , na gu' cham tu' na mu pai'p ja aagi'ñdha' gu mi oi'ñkam , mi' pɨx ba bakia' . Pu'ñi ɨp ba' aañ nañ pai' dhuuk mu jim .

Ja'pniñ ba' moop jam guguuxi'ñ jiñ jaaduñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan na pim siamri xi chɨ nɨidhat na cham jaroi' pai' dhɨr jimdat maakam jup ba jam iatgidha' na jax cham jir pui' na jax jix aa' gu Dios . Aapi'm cham tu' ji kɇkɇɇdat jir maa'n na pim jax mi' pui' xi jiimda' na jax jix aa' gu Dios na ba' bhaan jix maatɨ' ka' na pim dai gui' tu' ka'm nɨi'ñ .

Jiñ jaaduñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan , moo pim siamri xi chɨ nɨidhat na cham jaroi' pai' dhɨr jimdat maakam jam iatgidha' pui' xi kai'chidhat na Dios bhaankamu'n tu a'gada' . Bɨɨpɨ' pim xi mamtɨda' no' moo sɨlhkam Dios jir tujuandam tugi'ñ piam ku gu' cham , nam gu' xib mui' nai' oipichu' gui' nam maakam tu iatgi'ñ pui' xi kai'chidhat nam sap pɨk ba' Dios bhaankamu'n tu a'gim . Ba' aapi'm cham tu' maa'n jimdam ja kɇɇji mu ja'k jup ji ja kaaya' , ka xi mamtɨda' pim .

Ba' gu xib dai na jam a'm bam aa' pɨx ba'ñ jaaduñ na pim jix mat ka' na gu Jesuus buiñor jix bhai' na pim tɨ jɨɨ'ñdha' na ba' pu'ñi ja'k uañchudhix ka' gu jam ua'tulhdhara' , pui' na jax gui' nam cham mi' pui' jim gu pui' nat jax ja'k tu ua'nak gu Moisees na tu aagix ka' no' cham jɨ'x ka bhai' na uañchuda' gu ua'tulhdhar ga'n .

Aapi'm jiñ jaaduñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan , jix bhai' pim jum taat ka' buiñor guch Xoi'kam . Maa'n nañ jax jam tɨtda xib , na gu' aañ jiñ bui cham jax bua siañ pɨx mɨjɨ dɨr bhai' ji kɨksa , pui' na ñich jax tu jam ua'ñxi bɨɨpɨ' dɨr , na gu' aapi'm bhaan maachim na pim jax ja'k mi' pui' jiimda' na ba'x bhai' tu jam jimda' .

Pu xi chu jugai pim jam ki'aam jai' dhɨt no' pim jix bhio' na pim ba' cham jix bhiogɨt mu jiimda' pai' na pim tu jugia' , na gu'x bhai'm aa' gio soi'm ɨlhdhat na pim tu jugia' na ba' gu Dios cham ka jam tulhiiñchu'nka' . Ba' gu jai' na pim jiñ chɨkka na jax ja'k jix bhai' na pim tu duñia' , jano'ñ jam aagi'ñdha' nañ pai' dhuuk dɨɨlh mu jim .

Ba'p ja tɨtda gu Pilaato : ― Aa dho , mu pim xi bhɨika' ku gi . Aapi'm ba' dɨɨlh jix maat na pim jax dhooda' , no' pim mu'aa' piam ku gu' cham , no't dho ji baabui' tu' jax dhuu nar jix buam jum duukam , ka' pim ji ba' gu' pɨx bap kai'ch . Gu' ji nam gu'p kai'ch gu gɇ'gɇrkam nam ua' gu Jesuus : ― Dho ja'pji na gu' pui' ja'k tu daaxix aapi'm jam bui na saak cham bhai' nach mu'aa' gu jaroi' no't tu' jax dhuu aach nach jɨ'k jir Israel kam .

Dɨɨlh japim xim ga'ngada' bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n na jax chu'm jix io'm jir jam a'mkam na pim ba' dhi' bhaan tu juana' . Kani nañ bhaan jup xi chu jam a'gidha' gui' na tu'x io'm jum aa' na pim pu duñia' na ba'x bhai' tu jam jimda' .

Dhi' jɨ' ji pu'ñi chu'm nach a'm jum aa' na pui'm tɨɨtɨ'nda' nar ja gɇ'kam tuk gui' nam bhai' gɇ' chiop ja palhbui'ñdha' gu ja'tkam nam tu daanda' buiñor gu Dios gam nam tu ja daañxi'ñdha' na jax jir tu'm guch Xoi'kam , na joidham jir jix uañ , cham pai' tu' bhaan jix ua'tulhdhix , ni ku cham pai'x buam tu bua na tu' cham jir kɨɨ' , na xib bhammɨ ba daax dhaam jix io'm Gɇ'kam kɨ'n nat ya' dɨr maaxir ja bui gu ja'tkam jix u'ua'tulhdhix kam .
Bɨɨx aixim cham tu' bhaan jax jir jiñ aa'ndam iñ kia' , na gu' guch Xoi'kam pɨx nañ a'm tɨ nɨidhidhat jiñ palhbui'ñchu' nañ ba' bɨɨx aixim bhaan jix chu nakoo'nda' .
Dai pui' pɨx ja'k jix aa' gu' gu Dios na pim jix u'uañ jup tui'ka' gui' buiñor gammɨjɨ . Cha'pim nai' pɨx ja bɨɨm boppoda' gu u'uub no'm cham jir jam bɨpna' ,
Gammɨjɨ pim tu daanda' buiñor gu Dios , taxchaabgi'ñdha' pim sia tu' na pɨx bhaan , cha'pim dai gam ɨrdat darka' .

Ba' gu Moisees nat jax pu'ñi kai , pu jimɨiññor mi' dhɨr maakam ja'k , mu ja'k ba' pu bhɨi na pai' bhaan bipio' gu Madian dɨbɨɨr . Mi' ba' pu ji kiicha bɨɨma'n maa'n gu ubii , gook jamɨt ba' ja tɨɨgɨk gu a'aalh .

Gu chio'ñ cham jir am na iiñka' gu ma'oo'n , nat gu' gu Dios pu chu'm jup duu na jax chu'm dɨɨlh na ba' tu' ka'm nɨidhat buiñor tu daanda' . Ba' gu ubii no'm iiñ , dhi' bhaan jup jix maatɨ' ka' na tu' ka'm nɨi'ñ gu chio'ñ gui' nar bɨnga'n ka' .

Pu kai'ñkam jam a'm tɨ tɨɨ gu' gu Dios na pim maa'n tuuku' pɨx buiñor bap tui'ñgɨda' bhaan gu tukga'n guch Xoi'kam . Jix bhai' pim jum taatɨt tu oi'ñka' , na gu' dhi' guch Xoi'kam pui' ja'k jix aa' , pui' ja'k jam jujurtu'nka' na pim jix bhai'm taat ka' . Jix bhai'm taat ka' pim ɨp ba' buiñor guch Xoi'kam nax bhai' jam bua .

Gu Dios bɨɨx jup tu duu na jɨ'k tu'x chu jai'ch bɨɨx kap nat tu' ɨlh dɨɨlh , na jax bar tu gui' ga'n ba' gu xib sia nar tu' . Ba' tɨix aa' na gu ja'tkam nat jup ja duu bɨɨx dappaam bhammɨ aaya' am gɨt jix dhaam na pai'p tu'ii' nam bar maamra'n ka' , na gu' tɨix ja joi'gɨ'n , na ba' bɨɨx jai' ja a'm jup tu bi'ya' gui' na jɨ'k jir tu gui' ga'n . Ba'm aagat na pu'ñi maadɨt bha jootsa' bhammɨ dɨr jix dhaam , nat jax bhai' ba joot ba' gu Maraa'n jich Xoi'kam . Ku gu' pui' ja'k duuji gu Dios na pui'p xim tulhiiñdha' gu Maraa'n ya' dhi oi'ñga'n nam jax jum tulhiiñ gu ya' kam ja'tkam , na bhaan matgilhia' no't moo cham jum o'jolhdhak pu maa'n jimdam jum ua'tulh , na sap ba' no't cham jum o'jolhdhak jum ua'tulh , mi' dhɨr jix bhaai'n ka' na ja a'mkam mukia' bɨɨx gu ja'tkam .

¿ Paa pim dɨr ɨlhii'ñ nam gɨgɨ'lhi'ñ gu bhaamda' na pim ba' ba jim ñiñiokboixdha' tu' na pɨx bhaan gam na pim ba jim kooda' ? Dho bhai' dhɨr jam jujur am bhaan na pim bɨɨx aixim jix chu duñiik ka' na tu' cham jum aagaidha' , gam na pim bhaan tɨtɨɨ'ñchoka' gu tu' ya' kam dhi oi'ñga'n .

Jup tum kai'ch na sap bhai' jam bui maadɨt guch Xoi'kam jɨɨgi'ñdham xi bhɨɨk gu dɨ'ɨɨ'n tu'm bɨɨma'n ba tu kio . Jir jix buam dhi' pui' na tu bua gu jaroi' , ni kum cham pui' ja'k tu jim gui' nam cham tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam .

Gio gu' aapi'm na pim ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam , cham jɨ'xkat ja'xbui' bhaan tu jam mai'chia' na pim jɨ'x cham nakoo'nda' , aagix pɨx na pim jɨ'x jix ñakoo' jam tutku' bhaan . Jam palhbui'ñchu' gu' gu Dios na pim jaroi' soi'm ɨlhdhat buiñor tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ , gui' jam gu'nguxdha' jam tutku' bhaan na pim ba' nakga' gu tu' na bhaan tu jam mai'chia' . Maa'n ba' na pim jax buiñor tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdha' guch Xoi'kam na xi chu jam mai'chɨi .
Ba' aañ pu ba jam aagi'ñ nam gatuuk ka jai'chdhɨlhia' gui' nam ja'p ji bubuakia' na jax gu sɨsɨɨ' gux bhaa'mnagɨm nam jix ja jɨ'dɨlhkadam ka' gui' nam tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdha' buiñor guch Xoi'kam .

Ba' aach jix bhai'ch ɨlhdhat ya' dɨr ja'p ja'k jup ja aagi'ñ gu jai'ch jaaduñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan nam jai' kap maap jum jumpadat tu daan . Ja aagi'ñ ich na pim jix bhai' bhaan tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhat jix biiñak nach jɨ'k jax tu jim , xi gu'ki' pim sia kum giilhim jam tɨtdat jam tulhiiñchu'n gu ja'tkam .

Na ba' no'ch pu'ñi xich jajoi'gɨ'n bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n , gammɨjɨch a'm ba kioka' guch Gɨ'kora' , gam nax io'm ba xich joi'gɨ'nda' . Sia kuch gu' cham nɨi'ñ gu maaxik bhaan na jax chu'm , ku gu' ya'p tui'ka' ji jich bui no'ch pu'ñi ja'k xi dhuiñchu' .

Aañ jir Paablo , jir nobii'ñ iñ guch Xoi'kam . Dɨɨlh guch Xoi'kam bɨɨma'n gu Gɨ'korga'n Dios pu chu'm kɨ'n jiñ dhai mɨt , cham tu' na mɨt gu jax chu'm ja'tkam ya' kam dhi oi'ñga'n pu chu'm kɨ'n jiñ dhai . Gu Gɨ'korga'n guch Xoi'kam , dhi' pɨx jañ aagɨt jup kai'ch gui' nat jano' mi' dhɨr dua'ñdhak bamii' koi'ñga'n tɨr .

Aapi'm pu'ñi ɨp jiñ jaaduñ , mi' pim pui'p xi chu daa'ñchu'nda' nat jɨ'k jax tu duu guch Xoi'kam nam pai' dhuuk tulhiiñchudimɨk gu ja'tkam jix u'ua'tulhdhix kam . Cham tu' na pim moo maa'n jimdam totdonɨi pu ja'k suulhgia' no'm jax ba xi jam doodak gu ja'tkam na pim ba kaichu' guch Xoi'kam , piam ku gu' na cham bhai' tu jam jim , gu' ja'pji na pim jix bhai' pɨx jum taat ka' ji .
Ba' no' chich gu' pu'ñi jai' bɨɨma'n jup koi guch Xoi'kam , dho pui' bɨɨma'n duduadɨk jup baapam jachich nat pai' dhuuk duadɨk bam gui' .
Gio ja'p ja'k iam ja'pnip jum kai'ch ɨp : Jix bhai' pim xim taat ka' aapi'm na pim cham jir Israel kam ja'tkam ja bɨɨm gui' nam jir Israel kam , na Dios jir ja'tkam tugi'ñ .

Gux Dhuudu' kam jix Uañ Ii'mda'p kai'ch na sap jano' na pai' dhuuk bar mia'n ka' na ba ji chum kuugalhdha' ya' dhi oi'ñga'n , mui' cham mi' pui' ka tu daa'ñchu'nda' am na jax jix aa' gu Dios . Mu ja'k pɨx ba ja kaichgɨda' am gui' nam maakam tu mamtuxi'ñdha' gu ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios , dɨɨlh pɨx jam pui' ba tu buidha' nam jax ɨlhii'ñdha' . Pu cham jir sɨlhkam ka' , na gu' gu cham kɨkɨɨ' i'ii'mda' ja a'm bap tui'ñgɨda' dhi' dhi ja'tkam , dhi'm ba' pui' ja jurtu'nka' nam cham sɨlhkam ka tu a'gada' .

Gammɨjɨp ja tɨ'ñchoxi'ñka' guch Xoi'kam jɨɨgi'ñdham nam tu' ka'm ja nɨidhat gu gɇ'gɇrkam jix kakai' ganai' bɨɨx aixim nam tu' kɨ'n tu daraa , xix ja kɇɇkɇt am jax ñam kai'chdha' . Bɨɨpɨ'm jup xim ga'ngada' no' moor jix kɨɨ'p jum duukam gu tu' nam ja chianda' gu gɇ'gɇrkam .

Pu'ñi ja'k jam tɨtdada' am jai' dhɨt gu ja'tkam , nam gu' cham mat ka' nax io'm bɨjɨk dɨr nat jax jup duu gu Dios dhi oi'ñga'n gio dhix dhaam , chakui pai'x maax kat gu dɨbɨɨr na jax xib . Na gu' suudai' pɨx ya suu'n kat bɨɨx kap na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n moo jano' nat jax jup duu gu Dios , cham pai' maa'n kap jix chu gak kat . Gu' ji nat gu' dɨɨlh gu Dios pɨx jup tu duu nat ba' jɨ'ma'n kap pɨx jim tua gu suudai' , pui' kut ba'x chu gak kɨr jup tum duu jai' kap .

Gu' matgɨm cham jax bua ji siam jam tulhiiñchu'n no' pim gu' tɨi cham tu' jax bua . Pui' kam dho no'ch ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam . Jaiñ sia dɨɨlh guch Xoi'kam pu'ñi pɨk jum tulhii jano' nat pai' dhuuk tuch ñamkix guch ua'tulhdhara' pu daipu' maa'nnim pɨx , na ba' mi' dhɨr pu gammɨjɨ ba tuch uañdhix ka' . Gui' tɨi cham tu' pai'x buam tomaatɨt dho , ni nax ua'tulhdhix kat , cham tu' kuiñcha bia'kat nam pui' dooda' gɨt . Gu' ja'pji na gu' aachi' nach jix u'ua'tulhdhix , nat xich joi'ndat ba' pui'm duu jich a'mkam , na sap ba' mi' dhɨr bax bhaai'n ka' nach bhammɨ aaya'x dhaam na pai'p tu'ii' gu Dios . Ba' sia ku mɨt tɨi mua , gu ii'mdaga'n gu' pui' ji na jax ba dua ,

Jir am kat nam pu cham mamtɨda' gɨt na jax jir tu'm kam guch Xoi'kam nam ba' cham pu'ñix io'm bam ua'tulhdha' no' mɨt alhio pɨx xi chɨ jɨɨ'ñdhak buiñor guch Xoi'kam gio ja'k jup suulh mu ja'k na pai'r tu ua'tulhdhara' ja'p xi dhuuk na jax ja'k tɨix aa' guch Xoi'kam nam tui'ñgɨda' gɨt .

Aapi'm jiñ jaaduñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan , jix gɨ'm jañ ja'pnip xi jam tɨɨdam bhaankam gu Gɇ'kam jich Xoi'kam . Cha'pim mi bɨpnatda' gu jax chu'm jich Xoi'kam jɨɨgi'ñdham no' cham tu juanam , piam no' cham mi' pui' tu daa'ñchu' nach jax jam aagi'ñ na pim tui'ñgɨda' .

Ja'pni moom duu jano' nat gu Adaan bɨɨpɨ' ya' ai dhi oi'ñga'n bhaan nat ba' gatuuk guch Xoi'kam ya'p ba ai . Gu Adaan nat bɨɨpɨ' ya' do'ñcho gu Dios , dai dhi' bhaan ya jai'chdhɨr gu ua'tulhdhara' nat ba' bhaan ji jii gu muuki' , bɨɨx ba' gu ja'tkam bhai' ga'm pu ja daam jimiidha' ɨp , nam gu' pui'p bam ua'tulhi'ñdha' nat jax jum ua'tulh gu Adaan .

Bɨɨx ja jujur kɨ'n tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhat jix biiñak kat am buiñor gu Dios dhi' dhi ja'tkam , pui' kum ba' jai' dhɨt ja daam kɨɨkat gu jai' ja'tkam , jai' dhɨt ba' nam jix bhai' ja sɨlhkadimɨk gu ja'tkam nam pai' dhuuk jir gɇ'gɇrkam kat na jax jix aa' gu Dios . Jai' dhɨt ba' nat ja a'm tu bii gui' nat tu' tu ja iimchuda gu Dios . Gam jai' dhɨt nat cham jɨ'xdhat ja jugiokak gu maapi'ñ sia ku mɨt mɨjɨ tɨi ja iabo nam pai' kuup , nat gu' ja palhbui gu Dios nam buiñor jix biiñak ka' .

Piam jai' dhɨt nam xich bhaamkidhat jich gaagim nam jax pɨk xich dhooda' gɨt , aach cham jax jich aa' , nach gu' bia' gui' na jaroi'ch palhbui'ñchu' . Gio gu' chakuich koi mɨt sia kum tɨi xich koodak .

Ja'p japim pɨx ba ji buan jiñ jaaduñ na jax gu jax chu'm ubii no' tɨi bɨɨma'n tɨɨmui'x maa'n gu chio'ñ , no' gu' jumai bɨɨma'n boppo . Dhi' pu chu'm gu ja'tkam cham tu' ja kɨɨgalhi'ñ gu Dios , na pim gu'x maat na gu jaroi' no' pu'ñi pɨx ja'k tu jim , no' dai bɨɨx aixim tu bua na jax cham jir am , cham tu' bhaan tɨ nɨidhidha' gu Dios , jir kɨ'darga'n ka' pɨx , na gu' cham mi' pui' jimda' na jax jix aa' .

Ba' pui' ja'k ba ja jujurtuda gux Dhuudu' kam jix Uañ Ii'mda' nam cham tu' mu ja'k tu a'gapu' gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñi'ook na pai' jax bhaan bipio' gu Aasia dɨbɨɨr , mu ja'k ba' pu bhɨi mɨt na pai' bhaan bipio' gu Priijia dɨbɨɨr gio ba' gui' na bhaan jup bipio' gu Galaasia dɨbɨɨr .

Ba' ja'p ja'k iam nat dhi' pɨx Moisees jup tu ua'nak , tu aa' ɨp nam sɨlh pɨx buiñor tɨ jɨɨ'ñdha' gu Dios nam ba' buiñor jimia' , na gu' pu'ñi ja'k cham pɨk xijai . Na gu' cham jum aa' kia' nam jax jum aa'nda' : Jix xijai na jaroi' mu tɨsdia'x dhaam na ba' tɨgia' gu Dios , piam ku gu' mɨjɨmmɨ pai' nam jum jumpa'n gu ja i'ii'mda' gu koi'ñga'n na ba' mu ja'k tɨgia' no' ampɨk mu ja'k oirɨ . Matgɨm gu' ja'pji sap ja a'm nap tu'ii' gu ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios , ja chiichiñ am gio ja jujur am . Ba' xib dhi' pu'ñi ɨp , gu jaroi' no't ja'p pɨx soi'm ɨlhdhak buiñor ba tɨ jɨɨ'ñ guch Xoi'kam , gu Dios pui' ba tɨgia' na dhi'r jix kɨɨ' maa'nkam ka' . Cham jum aa' nax xijaim ɨlhii'ñdha' , no' gu' jax jum aa' : “ Jix xijai nañ mu tɨsdia'x dhaam nañ ba' tɨgia' guch Xoi'kam , piam ku gu' mu ja'k nam pai'm jumpa'n gu ja i'ii'mda' gu koi'ñga'n no' ampɨk mu ja'k oirɨ . ” Gu' ja'pji na gu' na jax bam kai'ch nach a'm jup tu'ii' gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ guch Xoi'kam . Dhi' ba'r di' gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñi'ook nach jax chu'm bhaan tu a'ga aach . Pui' ja tɨtdaim ich gu' gu ja'tkam nax bhaai' nam soi'm ɨlhdhai buiñor ba tɨ jɨɨ'ñdha' guch Xoi'kam , pui' pɨx , cham tu' nam aa' nam tu' pɨk jax dhuñia' .

Ba' maa'n bɨɨpɨ' mu jii mu oi'ñga'n bhaan nat ba nu'aam gui' na mi jim ja'aa ta'm . Ba' nat mu ɇɇk mi ja'p xeeñ ñua dɨbɨɨr ta'm . Bɨɨx gui' nam jɨ'k matgilhdhix ja kokobtai' am na bhaan jix maatɨ' nam kaichu' gu ja'ook na ɨɨbhidham tu'm gu tukga'n , gam nam tu' ka'm nɨidhat tu daan buiñor , sia gup duiñxim na pui'p tu'm , bhai' ji ja ai gui' na ja'p tu'm na biprɨ'x na giilhim jix ko'k .

Gu' ba' gu maakob sasoi' nam bɨɨx xikoolh dhɨr guguuk , gio gu maa'n oo'm daman maakob gu ja'tkam nam bɨɨx xikoolh dhɨr jup daraa , mi' ja o'lhia kɨ'n ji guguu mɨt ja'pni bɨɨpɨ' dɨr na pai' kɨɨk gui' jɨ' na ja'p ji buusan na gux kɨɨ' kasnir , bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n ja daada' am gu sasaasbikar gio gu a'lhich jaja' jix u'uam totbikdam , susdagɨm mi jim gui' na joidham uub na jax chu'm jum kubhioñxi'ñ gu Dios . Dhi' pɨx pui' ja'k jum maaxi'ñ gui' nam jɨ'k ba tu daan buiñor gu Dios nam ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam , na gu' pui' ji buusanda' nam tu kubhioñxi'ñdha' nam pai' dhuuk tu daanda' buiñor .

Gu jaroi' no' bɨɨx juraa'n kɨ'n tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ na gu Jesuus jir di' guch Xoi'kam nat Dios bha joot , dhi' jɨ' pui' bam kai'chdha' na Dios jir Maraa'n . Ba' no' pui' bam tɨɨtɨ' na Dios bar Maraa'n , jum aa' nax ja joi'ndat jix bhai' ja tɨtdada' gu jai' nam pui'p jir maamra'n gu Dios .

Gio nach cham tu' gɇ'gɇrkam jich chaat ka' , soi'ch pɨx jich ɨlhii'ñdha' . Ni kuch cham ja kokdhichu'nda' gu ja'tkam , ni kuch cham xich jɨjɨɨgak ka' aach dɨɨlh nach jɨ'k ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam .

Cha'p bhaamda' kɨ'n tu ja a'gi'ñdha' gu chichio'ñ jagɨ'gɨr nap pai' dhuuk tu ja a'gi'ñdha' . Tu' ka'm jap ja nɨidhat tu ja a'gi'ñdha' , nam gu' gu pu'ñim taatɨ'm ja'p ji buanda' na jax gum taat . Gio gum bɨpna' biipibop jap pui'p ja ɨlhii'ñdha' na jax gu mia'n jum jaaduñ , tu' ka'm jap ja nɨidhat tu ja a'gi'ñdha' .

Jix bhai' pim xi chu jimda' na jax jix aa' gu Dios mi' ja bui gui' nam cham tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam . Na ba' jano' na pai' dhuuk jum aaya' na ja aagi'ñdha' gu Dios bɨɨx gu ja'tkam nam tu' jax buimɨi nam duduakat , ba machia' am na pimɨt aapi'm sɨlhkam tu' ka'm tɨɨgɨk guch Xoi'kam , nam gu' xi jam nɨi'ñdha' na pɨx jix bhai' jam tɨɨdai jam aichdha' na pai'p tu'ii' . Ba' dai nam ba gɇ'kamtuda' gu Dios , sia kum gu' xib ka xi jam bhaamki'ñ nam jam nɨi'ñ na pim maakam pɨx tu jim na jax cham ja ko'raar .

Ba'x io'm jix joojoidhat mi' pui' jimda' iñ nam jax ja'k tu jimda' , cham jaroi' jai'ch ka' na tu' bhaan jax jiñ chɨɨda' , nam gu' bɨɨx pɨx jix mat ka' nañ mi' pui' jimda' . Ba' dhi' bhaan gɇ'kam jiñ chaatɨt bhai' ji ja tulhiiñchuda ñich gui' nam ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdha' buiñor guch Xoi'kam .
Ba' gui' xi ja tɨkka na pai' dhuuk dɨr bax kɨɨ' , jup ja tɨtda : ― ¿ Paa duuk dɨr bax kɨɨ' ? Ba' gui'p tɨtda am : ― Takaab dho mia duuk dɨr cham ka jɨbaamuk .

Ba' takaab dɨr na ba' moo bam aaya' gu bhaan Paaskua ta'm nam pai' dhuuk tu piastatda' gu Israel kam ja'tkam , mu jimɨɨk jup tɨtda am gu Pilaato na sap ja chiñia' gu sandaarui'x chugi'ñ nam ja o'mxichulhdha' gu ja kaakai gui' nam bhammɨ sissap kukrus ta'm nam ba' jotmoda' ko'ya' kum xi ja yassapai ampɨk na jurnia' , na gu' buimgidhak cham ka tum juanda' , dai ji nam ba tu piastatda' gu bhaan Paaskua ta'm , nam gu' cham aa' nam bhai' pu sissap ka' buimgidhak bɨx chanoolh .

Ba' nat pui' jɨ' giop xi chɨɨ'n gu Jesuus gux kai' Pilaato , cham bhaai' na jax kam duñia' , dai na tɨim ga'nga na jax pɨk dui do'ñcho' gɨt gu Jesuus . Gu' ji nam gu' gu Israel kam ja'tkam giilhim mu jiiñak , jup kai'ch am : ― No' pich jax dhuuk do'ñcho dhi maa'nkam nach jum chian nap mu'aa' , bhaan bax maatɨ' ka' nap bak cham tu' ka'm nɨi'ñ gu Seesar gux io'm gɇ'kam Rooma kam . Na gu' gu jaroi' no' dɨɨlh gɇ'kam jum taat na jax dhi maa'nkam , cham tu' kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ gu Seesar gux io'm gɇ'kam .
’ Aapi'm moo cham tu' bhaan jax jum aa'nda'ñ jaaduñ , Dios japim pɨx tɨ'ñchokat buiñor jix biiñak ka' gammɨjɨ , gio ba' aañ jiñ bui ɨp .

Gam na pim cham tu' ji ja ɨɨbhidhat gui' nam xi jam bhaamki'ñ , na gu' dhi' bhaan jix bhai'x maatɨ' ba' na pim aapi'm cham mu ja'k ka jiim na pim pai' gammɨjɨ mi' pup jum tulhiiñdha' gɨt , gio gui' nam xi jam bhaamki'ñ jix bhai'x maatɨ' ɨp nam mu ja'k jiim nam pai' gammɨjɨ mi' pup jum tulhiiñdha' , nat gu' gu Dios pui' ja'k duu na tu tui'ka' .

Aañ bɨɨpɨ' jam tɨɨgɨk jam daa jia bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n na pim bañ kaichgɨda' xib , cham tu' na pimɨt aapi'm bɨɨpɨ'ñ chɨɨgɨk bhai' jiñ kai . Ba' aañ xib pui' ɨlhii'ñ na pim nai' xi jimia' bɨɨx kap na pim jix bhai'm duukam jup tu duiñpu' jiñ a'mkam . Gammɨjɨ pim pɨx bhaan ji baapmigia' , na ñich gu' pu chu'm kɨ'n jam a'm tɨ tɨɨgɨk ba jam daa bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n . Ba' guñ Gɨ'kora' dɨɨlh jam maakidha' jiñ a'mkam gu tu' na jam a'm jum aagaidha' na pim pai' dhuuk mu taanda' .

Jaiñ gui' na Abeel tɨɨgich bɨjɨk , joidham jix kɨɨgalh gu Dios gui' nat tu' makgɨrxi gio dɨɨlh , cham tu' pui' na gu xio'gi'ñ Kayiin , na gu'x maat nat bɨɨx juraa'n kɨ'n soi'm ɨlhdhak pui' tu duu , na gu' tu' sɨlhkam kɨ'n tu' ka'm nɨidhat jix biiñak ka' buiñor . Ba' cham jax bua sia kut mui' oidha' ba jur jano' dɨr nat muu , xib gu' ja'p ji buusan ji na pui ya' oirɨt pui' na jax bax biiñak buiñor gu Dios , nach ba' aach nɨidhat pui'p jich biiñkada' buiñor guch Gɨ'kora' .

Aach dai dhi' kɨ'n pɨx daraa nach ja aagi'ñdha' gu ja'tkam nam pu cham maatɨt na jax ja'k ɨlhii'ñ na tu duñia' gu Dios ja bui . Ba' pui' pim pɨx ja'k jich ɨlhii'ñdha' nach ja'ppɨx jir tujuandam tugi'ñ guch Xoi'kam .
Gio gu chiichia' nat mui' ji ii' mu ja'k oi'ñga'n bhaan , ja'p na jax gu iibhai'ñga'n gu iigɨx na giilhim mui' mu pɨx tɨtronia' dɨɨrap no't jix io'm bhai' xi jɨb .
Pui' kuñ ba'p jam tɨtda aapi'm jiñ jaaduñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan na pim cham tu' ka ja daanda' gu ja'ppɨx didios jup duiñxim .
Ja'kbui' pim mai'chɨkda' gux buam jum duukam kɨ'n gux bhai'm duukam na pim jup tu buada' , cham tu' na ja'kbui' kat jam mai'chɨkda' .

Jix gɨ'm jap xi ja aagi'ñdha' guch Xoi'kam jɨɨgi'ñdham na cham jir am nam bhaan tu a'gada' gu tu' na pu cham tu' bhai' . Na gu' dhi' dai nam bhaan pɨx ba ñiokboda' , jix buam jum aa'nda' am ba' jai' dhɨt nam tɇ kɇɇkɇ' .

Soi' pim bam ɨlhdha' buiñor guch Gɨ'kora' na ba' xi jam joi'ndai gio jam a'm jup ba tɨ nɨidhidha' . Ja'p ji buusnia' na pim jix bhai' bam i'koimdha' gio na pim ba uana' gu jam jujur , na gu' ba tu jam uañdha' gu Dios no' pimɨt soi'm ɨlhdhak pui' ba tɨɨ'n na pim cham pui' ka tui'ka' , sia ku pim gu' pui' tɨi kam aagɨt na pim bɨɨx gok kap jup tui'ka' gɨt , pui' na jax na pim kaichgɨda' gu Dios gio ba' na pim pu'ñi bɨɨx aixim tu buada' gɨt na jax cham kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ .

Gu' ji no' pim gu' pu'ñi jɨ'k pɨx jix ja kɨɨgalhi'ñdhat jix bhai' ja bua gu ja'tkam , jai' ba' tu' pɨx ja ɨlhii'ñ japim , cham tu' mi' pui' duiñchu'nda' pim na jax ja'k tu daaxix gu ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios . Ba' dhi' bhaan bam ua'tulhdha' pim , na gu' dai na pim dɨɨlh jax ɨlhii'ñdha' pɨx na pim pu tu buada' , cham tu' na jax jix aa' gu Dios .
Nat gu' gu Dios pu kai'ñkam jich a'm tɨ tɨɨ nach ba' mi' pui' ba jiimda' na jax jix aa' , nach jix u'uañ jup tui'ka' gui' buiñor , cham tu' nach bɨɨx aixim tu buada' na tu' cham jir kɨɨ' .

Aañ jix maat na gu Dios jix dhaam dɨr jix bhaamut ja nɨi'ñ gu ja'tkam gui' nam cham mi' pui' jiim na jax jix aa' , na gu' dai nam bɨɨx aixim tu bua nam dɨɨlh jax ɨlhii'ñ , pui' ku ba' bɨxchu' bhaan pɨx ba ja tulhiiñchu'n . Na gu' pui' nam jax cham tu' ka'm nɨi'ñ gu Dios , ja'p ji buusan nam dhi' tu soobhi'ñ nam cham machia' gu jai' ja'tkam na jax pɨk ja'k jir mi' pui' nam tui'ñgɨda' .

Jam guguuxi'ñ iñ ɨp jiñ jaaduñ na pim siamri xim jajoi'gɨ'nda' bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n na ba' bhaan jix maatɨ' ka' na Dios jam a'm tɨ nɨidhim , na gu' gui' joidham jix chu joi'gɨ'n . Ba' gu jaroi' no' pu'ñi joidham jix ja joi'gɨ'n gu jai' , dhi' bhaan jix maatɨ' ka' na bax maat na jax jir tu'm kam gu Dios , ba' pui' bam kai'chdha' na Dios bar Maraa'n .

Ba' no' gu' maadɨt jax kai'ch nax chu maax kɨr bap tu'ii' na pui' jim aagɨt na ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam , gu' ji no' gu'x bhaamki'ñ gu jumai na pui'p tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam , cham tu'x chu maax kɨr jup tui'ka' , puix chukgam kɨr kap tui'ka' .

Sia no' jaroi' giilhim jam ai'chuxi'ñ piam ku giilhim jam tɨtda na jax aa' na pim maakam ba tu jim na pim ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam , gɇ'kam kɨ'n japim jix bhai' pɨx jum taat ka' sia , na gu' aapi'm gɇ'kam kɨ'n jam a'm tɨ nɨidhim gu Dios pui' ji chu't , na gu' jam a'm ba tajaañix gux Dhuudu' kam jix Uañ Ii'mdaga'n .
Ba' gu Paablo xi ja ñio'kdhak ba ja aagi'ñ nat jax ja'k palhbui gu Dios nat jix kɨɨ'p jum duukam jup tu duu ja bui gui' nam cham jir Israel kam ja'tkam .
¿ Aañ japim paa duuk jiñ ñɨi'ñ na ñich tu' jax ba duu na cham jir am , nar ua'tulhdhara' ? ¿ Piam aa na gu' cham ? Nañ gu' aañ sɨlhkam tu a'ga , gu' ji na pim gu' cham tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ .
Dappaam jañ tu ja uañdha' gu ja ua'tulhdhara' sia mɨt jax gɇ' bam ua'tulh , gio nañ gammɨjɨ pɨx ba tu ja uañi'ñka' no'm jum ua'tulhi'ñ , panaas kum moo pu cham pai'm ua'tulhi'ñdha' .
gio nat bhaankam jam maa gu matda' na pimɨt ba'x maatɨt kai gu ñio'ki'ñ , gam na ba'x bhaai'n ka' na pim jax ja'k bhaankam jup tu a'ga mi' dhɨr gammɨjɨ ja'k jai' ja bui gu ja'tkam .

Jiñ jaaduñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan , bhaankam guch Xoi'kam jich Gɇ'kam tuk gio bhaankam gux Dhuudu' kam jix Uañ Ii'mda' na pui' ja'k jich jujurtu'n nach xich jajoi'gɨ'nda' bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n , aañ soi' jam tɨtda na pim jiñ a'mkam xi chu daanda' bɨɨx dhɨt . Bɨɨx aixim bhaan jiñ chulhiiñaim iñ gu' .
Ba' bhai' ji ñio mɨt gu ja'tkam , jup kai'ch am : ― Iat ap dho . ¿ Jaroo gi pai'p jix chu chiañim nam jum mu'aa' ? Ja'pji nam a'm jup tui'dhi' gu ja'ook na ba' jax ña pɨx ba tu tatda' .

Na gu' jano' nat jaax gu ɨ'ra'n guch Xoi'kam na mɨt mua , gu Dios pɨx dɨɨlh pui' ja'k tɨi na gu ɨ'ra'n kɨ'n bhaan tu ja uañi'ñka' gu ja'tkam sia nar jaroi' ka' gɨt , dai no't pɨx soi'm ɨlhdhak ba tɨ jɨɨ'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam . Ba'x maatɨ' na gu Dios daix bhai' ji buusnichu' , cham tu' pui' na gu ja'tkam . Cham tu'p jum buixi'ñdha' gu' bɨjɨk ja bui gu ja'tkam sia kum jum ua'tulhi'ñdha' ,
Ba' gu tujuandam gio gu o'rosiiris mi ja'p xi chu naadat juuka' am , na gu' jano' pɨk ja'k jup jix jɨɨpi'ñ . Gu' ba' gu Peegro mi' pɨx jup ji juukgɨ ja bɨɨm , na gu'x jɨɨ'm .
Gio dhi' kɨ'n japim jum palhbui'ñka' nat tu' ba tu jam maa gu Dios , dhi' kɨ'n cham jax jam dooda' gu ja'ook sia kut tɨi ba ji jam oi .
Ba'p kai'ch gu Peegro : ― Pu xiib ji nañ pɨx mi dhaibu aañ nap pai' dhuuk gamai' ji jimia'ñ jaduuñ . ¿ Kux ba' gu' aañ pai'p bi'ya' dɨɨlh ? Daas iñ dho nañ mukia' jum a'mkam no'ñ xi ɨlhii'ñ .

Ba' dɨɨlh jam tajaañdha' gui' na pim kɨ'n jix bhai'm taatɨt tu oi'ñka' gammɨjɨ , na gu' dɨɨlh jix bhai'x maat na jax ja'k jich guguuxdhatu'nda' , sia kuch gu' aach dɨɨlh cham maat . Ba' gui' pɨx pui' jam jurtudidha' na pim ba' dai bhaan tɨtɨɨ'ñchoka' na tu'r jix bhai'm duukam , ba' bhaan jix bhai'm taat ka' pim , na pim gu' maap maa'n ñi'ook jup duuk guch Xoi'kam Jesuus .

Jaiñ gu' dhiñ ñɨɨn gio dhiñ chiñ jañ kɨ'n pɨx jup gɇ'kamtu'nda' tɨi gu Dios jich Gɨ'kora' nax dhaam jup tu'ii' , gu' ji nañ gu' dhi' kɨ'n pɨx giilhim jup ja tɨɨda' gu jai' ja'tkam nañ jix maat nat Dios jup ja duu , na saak jir pu chu'm am ɨp na dɨɨlh , na jax aa' kuñ pu ja tɨtdaimɨi nañ jax ɨlhii'ñ na cham kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ gu Dios .

Cham tu'ñ ja'p kai'ñkam jup kai'ch na pim cham pai' ka ja nɨi'ñdha' dhi' pu chu'm gu ja'tkam . Jum aa'nda' gɨt gu' na pim ya' dɨr bubuakia' dhi oi'ñga'n na pim ba' cham pai' ka ja nɨi'ñdha' , pui' na jax sia gui' nam ja'p pɨx jix chu aa'nda' nam gɨt bɨxchu' xi chu bia'ka' , piam gui' nam bɨxchu' tɨ ɨɨxi'ñdha' , piam gui' nam bɨɨx aixim tu'm tu didios tuk .
’ Aañ dho bɨɨpɨ' dɨr nañ chakui tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhat buiñor gu Jesuus Nasareet kam , pui'ñ aa'nda' iñ nañ bɨɨx aixim tu dooda' na jax ja'k dui cham jaroi' bhaan ka tɨtɨɨ'ñchuka' gɨt buiñor .

Nam gu' kai'ñkam gammɨjɨ pɨx jum ua'tulhi'ñ jia . Sia tu' ubii no' mi ja'p pai' oirɨ dho gu'x joidhat nɨi'ñdha' am ji , maakam jum aagɨt nɨi'ñdha' am . Dhi'm ba' ji ja nɨidhat pui' ja'k jup tɨ bhɨɨjidha' gu jai' nam cham jir pu chu'm , gio gu' bɨxchu'x aa'nda' am nam tu bia'ka' jix dha'ram namkɨm . Dhi' ba' kɨ'n pui' bam kai'ch nam cham tu'r jix kɨkɨɨ' ja'tkam .

Cham tu' pui' na jax gu jaroi' no' umua'ñdhix pɨx na tu bipia'da' , siam tɨix bhai' namkidhat chian na ja nuuka'nda' gu kakasnir . Bɨɨpɨ' kat dho mi' dhɨr ji dhai'ññia' no' mui' ba jim gu bhan piam gu sɨɨ' . Cham ja joi'ndai mi' xi ja iabui gu kakasnir , na gu' cham jir dɨɨlh ga'n ka' . Gu bhan ba' dai na ba ja da'ngia' jɨ'k na ɨlhii'ñdha' , jai'm pu pai' nam ja'k boopoya' totdonɨi .
Ja'pniñ ba' moo tɨip xi jam tɨɨdam jiñ jaaduñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan , na pim siamri xi ñakgat no' jaroi' giilhim jam tɨtda na jax cham jir am . Cha'pim juanda' , xi kɇɇkɇ' pim pɨx sia ku jax kai'ch .
Pu'ñi ɨp ba' gui' nam nai' tu a'ga gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ guch Xoi'kam , Dios pɨx dɨɨlh mi' ja tuttu' gu' nam ba' dhi' bhaan tu juanat mi' dhɨr mai'chidha' gu tu' nam kɨ'n duduatgɨda' .

Na ñich gu' aañ bha jii jia ya' dhi oi'ñga'n nañ ya' tu ja bɨ'ñxidha' gu ja'tkam nam jix chu tukgam kɨr jup tu'ii' , na gu' aañ ja'p ji buusan nañ joidham gɇ' tanoor , na ba' gu jaroi' na ba tɨ jɨɨ'ñdha' aañ jiñ bui , jix chu maax kɨr ji bi'ya' .

Mɨkkat ji na mɨt ba' giop bam tɨtgɨ bhammɨ ja'k gɇ' chiop na ba'p tɨtda gu Jesuus : ― Xib jap moo tu' ka'm xi chɨ nɨidhat jiñ jaduuñ na pich kapbhai' ba dua , na ba' cham gio tu'p bam duñia' jix io'm jix buam jum duukam no'r maa'n nap jax jum ua'tulhi'ñ .
Gio na pim pai' dhuuk jix bhai' ja buada' gu jai' , tu' sɨlhkam kɨ'n japim jix ja joi'mdat jix bhai' ja buada' .
’ Gu' ba' xib na pim bañ kaichu' , dai na pim mi' pui' xi jiimɨt nañ jɨ'k jax jam tɨtda , no' pim dho ji baabui' sɨlhkam jix aa' na pim tu' ka'm bañ ñɨi'ñdha' ya' dɨr ja'p ja'k , piam ku gu' cham .

Ba' aapi'm jiñ jaaduñ , mi' pim pui' xi jiimɨt na jax jam tɨɨdaidha' gu Dios , cha'pim gampai' pɨx ɨlhii'ñdha' . Na gu' no' pim gampai' pɨx ɨlhii'ñ jax no' tɨi jam tɨtda , jam tulhiiñchuda' ja'p nat jax ja dooda bɨjɨk guch bopxi kat nat pu maa'n jimdam ja tulhiiñchuda gui' na mɨt jɨ'k cham tu' ka'm tɨɨ nat jax tɨi ja tɨɨ'n . Aach pu'ñip tuch dhooda' no'ch am ɨrdat oipo no' tɨich a'gi'ñ nach jax ja'k tui'ñgɨda' .
Bɨɨpɨ' dɨr na pim chakui maatɨt dhi' na jax chu'm sɨlhkam jir Dios , jir tu ja juandam tuk ka' pim gu didios jup duiñxim ya' kam dhi oi'ñga'n .

Pui' kut ba' gu Dios aapi'm bɨɨpɨ' ba jam mattuda nat jax jum duu jano' nat pai' dhuuk giop dua guch Xoi'kam , na pim sap ba' ba machia' na jax ja'k jam a'm tɨ nɨidhidha' gu Dios na pim sap ba' cham kam ua'tulhi'ñdha' bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n aapi'm .

Ba' aach maaxik tɨɨ dɨɨlh jich buupui kɨ'n gu dhi' pui' nat jɨ'k jax tu duu gu Jesuus bhammɨ ja'p na pai' jax jir Judea dɨbɨɨr , gio ba' bhammɨ ja'k na pai' jax jir Jerusaleen . Gatuuk ba' am xi mua mɨt , bhaan gu kuruus ta'm jamɨt xi sissapak .

Jiñ jaaduñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan , bhaankam gu Gɇ'kam jich Xoi'kam soi' jam tɨtda iñ na pim gammɨjɨ maa'n ñi'ook xip duukat , cham tu' na pim dai ñiokboda' . Jix bhai' pim kai'chɨt tu oi'ñka' , cha'pim maakam kai'chdha' jai' gio jai' maakam .
Aapi'm cham tu' jam kɨɨgalhdhat bɨɨpɨ' dɨr gu Dios , na pim gu' cham tu'r Israel kam ja'tkam ka' jam jujur am bhaan , daix buam jum duukam japim jup tu buada' na tu' cham jir kɨɨ' .

Ja'p jap xi buusnichgɨda' no' bɨxchu' bhaan xi chum mai'chim nap jir biapma' . Xi kɨɨkgɨda' ap nap mi' pui' jimda' na jax jix kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ guch Xoi'kam , gammɨjɨp jix biiñak ka' buiñor , xix ja joi'mdat ap gu ja'tkam . Jix bhai'p jum taatɨt oirɨda' , ja bɨɨm ap gui' nam mi' pui' jiimdat bɨɨx ja jujur kɨ'n pui'p iim guch Gɨ'kora' .

Gu' ba' na pimɨt gu' aapi'm ko'ɨɨk giop ba dudua bɨɨma'n guch Xoi'kam , jum aa' na pim gaa'ñchu'nda' na pim jax ja'k daix dhaam ja'k tu mai'chia' , na gu' guch Xoi'kam jix dhaam daa , kɨɨ'n dɨr ja'k daa na pai' gu Dios .

Ba' nat pai' dhuuk maadɨt xi chu kuich , jix dhaam dɨr mui' pu ji ii' gu chia mu ja'p oi'ñga'n bhaan , gio ba' gu tai ɨp bɨnkam gu ɨ'ɨɨr . Ba' pu mɨi alhi'ch gu dɨbɨɨr bɨnkam gu tutua gam sai' na mi ja'p ka tu tuutɨt na jɨ'x pɨx aagix na tɨ mɨɨya' .

jup kai'ch am : Taxchaab Dios jich Gɨ'kora' nap jix io'm jir gɇ'kam kat bɨxchu'x aichu'n nap pu tu duñia' , gio nap bɨjɨk dɨr pux jai'ch na chakui jai'ch kat dhi oi'ñga'n , nap gu' aap bɨɨx kap bar gɇ'kam ba' xib na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n gam sia nar pa ja'k .

Ba' gu Jesuus jup tɨtda : ― Aap gu' moo cham jax ji kai'chɨt alhi'ch xiñ baxbhidha' jiñ jaduuñ , nap gu' cham maat nañ jir tu'p tu'm da' aañ nañ ya'm taan gu suudai' , ni kup jix maat na tu'm makia' gu Dios no'p moo soi'm ɨlhdhai ba taanda' gɨt . Pu kani no' pich aap soi'm ɨlhdhak jiñ chaa gu suudai' , jix kɨɨ' ji nañ jum makia' na jax chu'm kɨ'n jix bhai' ba tum jimda' no' pich ba ii .

Guch Xoi'kam pɨx jir jam ii'mda' aapi'm , na gu' na pai' dhuuk maaxik jam buim maaxdha' , aapi'm pui' buiñor jup jum maaxdha' , ba' dai na pim buiñor ja'k ji aaya' , gammɨjɨ pim ba' pu buiñor bap tui'ka' na pai' dhɨr jix io'm jir gɇ'kam .

Daipu' dhi' na jɨ'k pɨx ya' tu daa na pim ba nɨi'ñ , na pim ba' tu jiñkuidhai tɨ jɨɨ'ñdha' na gu Jesuus jir di' guch Xoi'kam na maaxik ya' xi oilhimɨk dhi oi'ñga'n bhaan , nar Maraa'n gu Dios nat bha joot . Na ba' gu jaroi' na tɨ jɨɨ'ñdha' buiñor baidhika'x dhaam ja'k na pai' gammɨjɨ pu ba duaka' .

Ku gu' aach nach jɨ'k ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam , cham tu' kach bɨpnat ji siam jax tɨich iatgi'ñ gu dhi' pu chu'm gu ja'tkam , nach gu' aach jix bhai' bax maat na jax pɨk ja'k jir sɨlhkam , dai ji gui' nam cham tu' ka'm nɨi'ñ gu Dios nam ba' joidham ja kɇɇkɇ' . Aach ba' no'ch tɨip xi chu ja a'gi'ñ gui' nar sɨlhkam ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios , pu cham kaim ka' am , na gu' cham ja ko'raarda' , dai ba' gui' nam tu' ka'm nɨi'ñ gu Dios nam ba' joidham jup jix kaik ka' . Pu'ñi ja'k japim ba' duujix mat ka' jiñ jaaduñ nam jax chu'm sɨlhkam Dios bhaankamu'n tu a'gidha' gio ba' na jax chu'm cham .

Ja'p chi alh moox xi'ɨraam no'm jai' mɨjɨmmɨp xi dharaa pai' na pim tu piastatda' daich Xoi'kam jɨɨgi'ñdham na pim jix bhai'm taat ka' buiñor gu Dios . Nam gu' dhi' dhi ja'tkam cham tu' ka'm tɨ nɨi'ñ , ni nam jix maatɨt tu xi'ɨ'ra , gɇ'gɇr bha chu koi'mɨi am nam jɨ'x ɨlhii'ñdha' , nam jax dhui pɨx ba' mi' ba jam ia'ñdha' nam jax jir tuutu'm no' pim gan ja bɨɨm tu kua' . Nam gu' mu dɨr bha ja'k pu cham xi jam joi'gɨ'nda' , dai dɨɨlh pɨx nam xim joi'gɨ'n . Dhi' ja'pni pɨx ji buan am jia na jax no' tɨi pɨx jix chuk sai'chu' gu tɨbaa' , gu' ji no' gu' cham bha duuk , dai na pɨx ji jim gammɨjɨ pai' na ja'k ua'ka' gu jɨbɨɨlh . Piam ja'pni ɨp na jax gu jax chu'm ɨ'ɨɨx no' cham i'bhai'ñchar sia kut tɨi bam ai na pai' dhuuk iibhai'ñchai ba bhaaya' gɨt . Ja'p ji buusan nam pu ba ko'iix dhi' dhi ja'tkam , nam gu' cham xiim bam tulhiiña' .

Mi' dhɨr ba' dai nam ja boosgaidhat mu ja'p ba ja darsaim gux kako'kkam bɨɨx ba'bhak soosnap bhaan gu bapakxidhara' , nam pui'm aa' na jai' ja a'm bhɨɨya' gu ɨkgiga'n gu Peegro na pai' dhuuk bha buusnia' nam sap ba' pu duduadhia' .

Ba' na pim tu' sɨlhkam soi'm ɨlhdhat tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdha' gu Dios , dhi' ja'p ji buusanda' na pim daa'nka' gu baiñum komaarak na pim kɨ'n sosbhidha' gu u'uu'n gu ja'ook na pai' dhuuk mui' ji jam mumuuya' xi mɨmɨichdhai na pai' dhɨr jix mu'muk .
Bɨɨx na pim jɨ'k tu' jax buada' , cha'pim jum o'jolhdhat pu buada' , gu' ja'pji bɨɨx jam jujur kɨ'n , panaas ku pim guch Xoi'kam pɨx pu buixi'ñdha' gu tu' , cham tu' gu ja'tkam ya' kam dhi oi'ñga'n .

Gio jam guguuxi'ñ iñ ɨp na pim cham jai' dhɨt ja bɨɨm boppoda' gu jai' u'uub no' pim cham maap tɨɨmui'x . Ni ku pim cham tu' mɨk bua' ji tu' pɨx ba ɨlhii'ñdha' gu Dios nat tɨi xi jam joi'ndak tu jam uañ gu jam ua'tulhdhara' . Pui' dhom duu ji gui' na Esauu tɨɨgich bɨjɨk , na pu'ñi moo gampai' pɨx tɨ ɨlhii'ñdha' . Tɨɨ' nat ga'ra nar bɨɨpɨ' kam kat , maa'n jooxia' gu bhab gisaar jamɨt pɨx xi maa , ja'p ji buus ba' nar gatuuk kam pɨx ba' .

Gu' ji nam gu' gui' cham tu' pui' ɨlhii'ñ , jup kai'ch am gɇ' kɨ'n : ― Dhi' cham ji . Gu Barrabaas ji nach jix aa' nap do'ñcho' no'p moo maa'n jup jix dho'ñchom . Gu Barrabaas jix ɨxbi' ka' ku mɨt ba' kuu .

Gio nam cham jɨ'xkat pu duñia' nam jax tɨi xi chɨ'ya' , sia ku mɨt tɨi sɨlhkam pui' xi chɨi nam pu duñia' gu tu' nar jix bhai'm duukam , dai gu tu' nar jix buam jum duukam dho gi gu' pu duñia'm ji no' mɨt ba ɨlh . Gɇ'gɇrkam jum taatɨt gaagidha' am gu tu' nam kɨ'n jix bhai'm taat ka' dɨɨlh , iam nam gaagidha' gɨt nam jax ja'k mi' pui' jiimda' na jax jix aa' gu Dios .
Pu'ñi dhuuk ba' gu Dios dɨɨlh jix io'm gɇ'kam kɨ'n dai nat pai' dhuuk giop tɨs jix dhaam , cham jax chu'm jumai ja'xbui' joidham kaidha' na jax gui' .

Na gu' dhi' na chich jɨ'k jax ba tu jam a'giñ jaaduñ bhaankamu'n gu Dios nach jup kai'ch nar gɇ'kam kat bɨxchu'x aichu'n gu Gɇ'kam jich Xoi'kam , gam nach jup kai'ch na gio bhai'p jimda' gatuuk , cham tu'r iatda' pɨx dhi' , ni ku chich dɨɨlh pui' ja'k xi duuk nai' ja'p pu chu'm ba tu a'gim , ni ku cham tu'r sapooki'ñ . Ja'pjir sɨlhkam ji dhi' , maaxik jachich tɨɨch buupui kɨ'n gu Gɇ'kam jich Xoi'kam nax bhai'm duukam jup tu buimɨk na ya' xi oilhimɨk kuch ba' pui' ba tu jam a'gi'ñ .

Bɨɨx moo nat jɨ'kim ba tu jam ua'ñxi , dhi' pɨx pu chu'm bhaan tu a'ga nañ jax chu jam a'gi'ñ aañ , na pui' bhaan jup jam guguuxi'ñ na pim jax ja'k tui'ñgɨda' , sia ku jɨ'ma'n kap jix io'm jix xijaim tu a'ga na cham pɨk moo jaroi' maatɨt xi kaaya' na jax jir jum duukam . Ku gu'x maatɨt kaaya' am ji gui' nam bɨɨx ja jujur kɨ'n jix biiñak buiñor gu Dios . Gu' ba' jai' dhɨt nam cham pɨk buiñor jix biiñak kat gu Dios tu jiñkui'ñdha' dhi ua'na'n gu Paablo , maakam pɨx ɨlhdhat kɇɇkɇ' am , cham tu' pui' na jax kai'ñkam jup jum kai'ch . Ba' no' mɨt gu' cham bɨɨx ja jujur kɨ'n xim gaa na jax pɨk kai'ñkam jup jum kai'ch , pu cham jɨ'xdha' maatɨt kaaya' am , maakam pɨx ɨlhdhat kɇɇkɇ' am . Sia gu jai' ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios na cham jir ua'na'n gu Paablo bhai' maakam ji dhuñia' am nam jax pɨx ja'k ɨlhdhat kɇɇkɇ' dɨɨlh , cham tu' na jax pɨk kai'ñkam jup jum kai'ch , nam gu' cham bɨɨx ja jujur kɨ'n jix biiñak kat buiñor gu Dios tu jiñkuidha' . Ku ba' gu' dhi'x io'm ja tulhiiñchuda' ji gu Dios no' mɨt jax dhuuk maakam duu .

Gu' ji na gu' na mɨt pai' dhuuk ba maat gu Bernabee gio gu Paablo , giilhim jix buam jum ɨlh jamɨt , ba' xi ja saassak jamɨt gu daam dɨr kam ja kuktun mui' ji jii mɨt mɨjɨ ja'p ja saagi'ñ gu ja'tkam , xi jiiñkidhat am jup kai'chim am :

Guch Xoi'kam bha jii ya' dhi oi'ñga'n nat bha ja palhbuidham gui' nam jir Israel kam ja'tkam , pu kai'ñkam bha jii nat bhai' pu duñiim nat jax ja tɨɨdak gu Dios bɨjɨk guch bopxi kat na pu'ñich palhbuidha' gatuuk aach nach jir Israel kam ja'tkam . Ba' dhi' bhaan matgir na gu Dios pui' duñia' jax no't ba tɨi .

Ba' gu jaroi' no' mi' pui' tɨi xi jim na jax moo tu aagix gu ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios na tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam , gu' ji no' gu' buam pɨx tu ñiok na jax cham jir am na cham kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ gu Dios , pur cham tu' ka' , sia ku gu' tɨi pui'm aa' na mi' pui' bhɨichu' na jax tu aagix , jir ja'p pɨx ka' ba' na pui'm tɨɨtɨ'nda' nar jich Xoi'kam jɨɨgi'ñdham , na gu' giilhim tu ñiokda' .

¿ Cham aa gu' tɨ'ñcho pim nañ jup jam tɨtda na gu jax chu'm tujuandam jir kɇɇkam ka' pɨx , cham tu' ja'xbui'p xim taat ka' na jax gui' na mi' buiñor tu juanda' ? Gu' ba' xib pu'ñi ɨp no' mɨt aañ cham jiñ kɨɨgalh gu ja'tkam , aapi'm jam pui' cham jup jam kɨɨgalhdha' , nam gu'x mat ka' na pim aañ jiñ kaichgɨda' . Piam ku mɨt gu' jai' dhɨt cham jax ji chɨ'ɨɨk mi' pui' ba jii na pim jax tu ja a'gidha' jiñ a'mkam , dhi' ba' ja'p ji buusnia' nam aañ xiñ kɨɨgalhdhaiñ kɇɇji mi' pui' ba jima' nañ jax tu a'ga xib .
Ba'p ja tɨtda gu Jesuus gui' nam jɨ'k ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor : ― No' pim mi' pui' jiimchu' nañ jɨ'k jax tu jam a'gi'ñ , bhaan bax maatɨ' ka' na pim bañ kaichu' .
’ Ba' gatuuk bhai' bhiogi' ji jii bɨɨx kap na jɨ'x bhaan bipio' gu Ejipto dɨbɨɨr , gio ba' ya ja'p na jɨ'x jir Kanaan . Ba' guch bopxi kat cham ka bia'ka' am nam tu' jugia' .

Joidham gɇ'kam kɨ'n jañich jix bhai'ñ ɨlh aapi'm jam bui na ñich pui' ba tɨ kai na pim joidham bɨɨx jam jujur kɨ'n tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhat buiñor guch Xoi'kam mi' pui' ba jiim na jax jix aa' gu Dios jich Gɨ'kora' .

Na gu' gu jaroi' na cham ja joi'gɨ'nda' gui' nam maap jix bhai' kai'chdha' , ni gu jajaa'nni'ñ na pɨk tɨix io'm jum aa'nda' , dhi' bhaan jix maatɨ' ka' na cham tu' buiñor jix biiñak ka' guch Xoi'kam . Jix io'm cham jir kɨɨ' maa'nkam ka' ba' , cham tu' pui' na gui' nam cham tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdha' buiñor guch Xoi'kam .

Bax bhaai' ba' xib nach sɨlh buiñor tu daanda' gu Dios soi'ch ɨlhdhat , nach gu' ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam gui' nat jaroi' tuch ñamkix guch ua'tulhdhara' . Ja'p ji buus nat jich batbich joidham jix kɨɨ' suudai' kɨ'n , nat gu' bɨɨx uañchuda nach jɨ'x jix u'ua'tulhdhix kat .

Dai sap ja'pni pɨx ja kɇɇkɇ' am jai' nam kai'chdha' : “ Xib sap mu pai' oirɨt ba tu a'ga gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ guch Xoi'kam gui' na ka xich bhaamkidhat ka xich koodak ka' . Pu chu'm sap jup ba tu a'ga na jax chu'm cham aa'nda' na gɨt cham pai' pu chu'm ka tum a'gada' . ”

Ba' aañ pu jam tɨtdañ jaaduñ na pim cham jax jum aa'ntugɨt xi chu jugai gu tu' nach ua' , na gu' dhi'x io'm jum aa' jia no' pim dho jix aa' na pim duduatgɨda' . Na gu' tɨi cham tu' jaroi' maadɨt mi' pai' bhai'mui mukia' jia , nich chu' kuupa'n dho moo ku jaroi' maadɨt mai' bua' .
Jix maat iñ ɨp nar maa'n na pim jax tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ jiñ bui sia kum giilhim jam tulhiiñchu'n gu ja'tkam na pim bañ kaichu' .

Gio gu chichio'ñ nap saak ja darsa' nam tu ja a'gi'ñdha' guch Xoi'kam jɨɨgi'ñdham , jum aa' nam jix gɨ'm tu a'gada' gio sɨlhkam , gam nam tu' ka'm ja nɨi'ñdha' gu jai' . Xim ga'ngidhat am dɨɨlh nam jax ja'k mi' pui' jiimda' na jax jix aa' gu Dios , gio nam gammɨjɨ bhaan tu daa'ñchugɨt mi' pui' jiimda' dhi' nach tu' bhaan jix biiñak kat tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ . Gam nam jix chu joi'gɨ'nda' , gio nam jix ñakoo'nda' gu tulhiiñara' nam ba' nakga' na pai' dhuuk ja daam ji jimia' .

Dho gu' bɨjɨk gu Dios cham tu'p jum buixdhat dho ja bui gu ja'tkam , sia kum bɨɨx aixim pɨx tu jimda' nam jax ɨlhii'ñdha' dɨɨlh , gu' xib pui' kai'ch ji nam sap bɨɨx kap mi' pui' ba jimia' gu ja'tkam na jax jix aa' .
Ba' gu dɨ'ɨɨ'n gu Jesuus mi ja'p amuub gam kɨɨk na pai' sissap kuruus ta'm gu maraa'n , bɨɨma'n gu dhixii'ñ Mariiya nar bɨnga'n gu Kleopas , gio ba' gu Mariiya Magdalena .
Ba' gu jannulh na tɨi'chu' , ɨ'ɨɨr kɨ'n mamxidhix , jix chukuum jix bɨ' . Gio ba' moo ja'pni ja'k jup tɨɨ' dhi' jɨ' nax chua kabai cha'm jim : Gu ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios .

Ku gu' aapi'm na pim jɨ'k jix bhai' bax kaapak na pim tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam , jum aa' na pim cham ja taagiob tu kua'da' gui' nam chakui bhai' kaapak buiñor guch Xoi'kam , sia ku pim gu' aapi'm jix maat na cham xidhuu gu jax chu'm koi' .

Pui' pu ba kai'ch gu Dios na pu'ñi giop dua'ñdha' na ba' cham jum ja'bsuna' gu tukga'n , pui' ku ba' jumai kap ja'pnip tu ua'ñix bhaan gu u'uan , na ja'pnim kai'ch : “ Tu kuugalhdha' iñ gu pui' na ñich jax ja'k ba tu daax gu Dabii nañ pu tu duñia' . ”

Jano' dɨr nañ pai' dhuuk duadɨi giop bamgia' mu dɨr koi'ñga'n tɨr , jix bhai' ba machia' pim na sɨlhkam jiñ buip tui'dhi' guñ Gɨ'kora' , gio aañ ya' dɨr mu ja'k buiñor jup tui'dhi' ɨp . Bɨɨx japim bhai'p ji machia' nañ aañ jam buip tui'dhi' na pim jɨ'k bañ kaichu' na pim jiñ bui tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ .

Ba' no'ch mi' pui' xi jiim na jax jix aa' gu Dios , dhi' bhaan bax maatɨ' ka' nach tu' sɨlhkam bɨɨx jich jujur kɨ'n tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhat tu' ka'm ba nɨi'ñ , ba' pui' bam kai'chdha' nach jix bhai' bax maat na jax jir tu'm kam .

Pui' kuñ ba'p jam tɨtda na pim ya' pu ko'ya' jix u'ua'tulhdhix kam no' pimɨt cham tɨ jɨɨ'ñ nañ aañ jir di' nañ bɨjɨk dɨr pux jai'ch bɨɨma'n guñ Gɨ'kora' . Ya' pup jir bi'xim ka' pim jix u'ua'tulhdhix kam .
Gu' ji na gu'x maimtu' gu ubii kɨ'n gu ja ɨ'ɨɨr gui' nam tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhat buiñor gu Dios gio gui' nam bhaankamu'n tu a'gat . Ba' aañ mi' pɨx pui' ba tu'ii' ,

Ba' gatuuk na tɨi ba chian gu taata'n na tu daañxidha' nax bhai' tu jimia' , nap jum aa' na gui' bhaan bipio' nar bɨɨpɨ' kam na jax tu daaxix , cham tu' tu daañxi gu taata'n , nat gu' pu bɨɨpɨ' dɨr ba maa gu sɨpdhi'ñ na saak gui' ja'p ji buusnia' nar bɨɨpɨ' kam ka' . Ba' tɨi ma susua ja'p io'm pa' , cham jɨ'xdha' bhaan ka bii gui' na a'miram bipio'dat nar bɨɨpɨ' kam , nat gu' ga'ra , ja'ppɨx ba ji buusan gu' nar gatuuk kam .

Gam gu ja'ppɨx ja'tkam bha ja'p oipot jum ñiñiokboixi'ñ am . Jɨ'ma'n jup kai'ch am : “ Joidham jir jix bhai'kam . ” Jai'm maakam jup ɨlhii'ñ , jup kai'ch am : “ Chaam tu' , ja'pji na jax dhui ja iatgi'ñ gu ja'tkam . ”

Ba' mui' ja'tkam tɨ jɨɨ'ñ jamɨt buiñor gu Gɇ'kam jich Xoi'kam , gio ba' na mɨt cham tu' pui' ja'k ka tu jii nam jax ja'k ka tu jimdat bɨɨpɨ' dɨr , na gu' gui' na mɨt jaroi' tu ja a'gi , giilhim joidham jix bhai' xi buada' am na mɨt tu ja a'gi , na gu' ja a'm tɨ nɨi'ñ guch Gɨ'kora' .

Jax dhui na gu' gu Dios pux maatɨt jich ñɨi'ñ nach jax jir tuutu'm . Jix kɨkɨɨ' ja'tkam jich chɨɨgɨk pu chu'm kɨ'n jich dharai nach nai' tu a'ga' gu ñio'ki'ñ na bhaan tu a'ga nam jax ja'k duñia' gu ja'tkam , nam ba' cham mu ja'k ka bhɨɨya' nam pai' gammɨjɨ mi' pup jum tulhiiñdha' . Dai ba' pu'ñi pɨx jach tu a'gim , cham tu' jumai tu' pup kui'mgi'ñ ich , ni ku chich cham aa ɨp nam pɨx jix bhai'm taatɨt joidham jich aa'nda' gu ja'tkam , nach gu' aach jix aa' na dai gu Dios jix bhai'm taat ka' aach jich bui , gui' nax bhai'x maat nach jax jich aa' jich jujur am bhaan .
Gu' ji na gu' gu Dios jir jix bhai'kam jich bui , aañ taxchaabgi'ñ , nat gu' gui' pɨx pui' tu duu nach bhaankam guch Xoi'kam tu' pɨx bia' gu muuki' .
Gio gu' gu ubii gui' na sɨlhkam pui'm tɨɨtɨ'nda' nar dɨɨlhdhɨm , soi'm ɨlhdhat tu daanda' buiñor gu Dios gammɨjɨ nabap tanoolh gio nabap tukaa' .

Pui' na jax no' pimɨt chakui tu' mu taa , bar am dho na pim mui' xi chañia' gu tu' na jam a'm jum aa' . Tu' gi na pim gu' aañ jiñ bui bax biiñak , na pim ba'x io'm gɇ'kam kɨ'n jix bhai' bam ɨlhdha' no't ba jam maa guñ Gɨ'kora' .

Ba' jaroi' maadɨt no't tɨ jɨɨ'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam no'r tujuandam pui' cham namkidhat am , sia pui' cham jax jup jim aagɨt mi' pui' xi jimda' na jax jix aa' gu Dios . Piam kut gu' jotmoda' jax xix bhaaigɨ na buusnia' mi' dhɨr na pai'r tujuandam , jir am na buusnɨi maa'n na jax mi' pui' jimda' na jax jix aa' guch Xoi'kam .

Dho gu' dhi' jim ba' bar di' nam bha ja'p ba oipo jam bui nam ba xi jam kokdhichdhak na pim joidham maap maa'n ñi'ook jup duukat kax biiñak buiñor guch Xoi'kam , na pim sap ba'm jɨ'dɨlhkadai mu ja'k ji ja bɨnta' na pim jai' pui' ja'k jup ba tu jimda' nam jax tu jim dɨɨlh . Pui' kai'ñkam pɨx jam ba' maakam ba xi jam iatgidhak , na gu' dhi' dhi ja'tkam cham tu' ja a'm tajaañix jia gux Dhuudu' kam jix Uañ Ii'mda' na pui' ja'k ja jurtudim nam ba' xi jam iatgidhak , dɨɨlh pɨx ji nam gɇ'gɇrkam jim taatɨt .

Gu Dios jam a'm tɨ tɨɨ aapi'm na pim ba'r ja'tkam tugi'ñ ka' , bhaan guch Xoi'kam matgir nat tu' sɨlhkam xi jam joi'mdak jam a'm tɨ tɨɨ . Gu' pɨx ji nañ gu' cham maat na pim jax kai'ñkam jotmoda' maakam jup ba tu jim na jax ja'k cham aa' gu Dios . Cham japim mi' pui' ka jiim , jumai bhaan gu ñi'ook japim pɨx bhaan ba tu daa'ñchu' , cham tu' kia' gui' na jax chu'm pɨk jir sɨlhkam .

Jam guguuxi'ñ iñ ɨp na pim joidham jix bhai' kai'chɨt jix jɨjɨkgɨm tu oi'ñka' , cha'pim tu' kɨ'n jum kokdat , gu' dai ji na pim soi'm ɨlhdhat mi' pui' xi jiimda' na jax jir am . Cha'pim kam ua'tulhi'ñdha' , na gu' gu jaroi' no' daim ua'tulhi'ñ , cham jɨ'xdha' aaya' bhammɨ buiñor gu Dios .

Ba'p ja tɨtda ɨp gio gu Jesuus : ― Ea gor gio mui'p xi bua suudai' chɨr gu jam asaak ja'pni dhɨr ja'k kɨɨ'n dɨr dhi kanuub , ea no' mɨt cham iam mim gaam . Ba' gui'x oodam gio mɨjɨp xi bua mɨt gu asaak , paa gi ba' tu' . Gu ja'xpɨx na mɨt gio bhai' tɨip ji baabu , giilhim jix bɨɨt ji , cham bhaai' nam jax ka baabu' nam tɨi baissɨn , na mɨt gu' giilhim mui' mim iicha gu boptop .
Na gu' cham jax bua sia ku jaroi' matgilhdhix nar Israel kam piam ku gu' cham , gu' ja'pji no' tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhat buiñor guch Xoi'kam mi' pui' jim na jax jix aa' .

Piam kut gu' jaroi' maadɨt bhaan bii na ja gu'nguxi'ñdha' gui' nam tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdha' buiñor guch Xoi'kam nam jax ja'k cham jum o'jolhi'ñdha' , dho pui' ba duiñchu'nda' ɨp sia . Piam kut gu' jumai bhaan jup bii na tu ja maakda' gu tu' gui' nam cham tu' bia' ni jɨ'x , dho pui'p ba duiñchu'nda' dho . Piam kut gu' jaroi' bhaan jup bii ɨp na jax ja'k ja sɨlhka'nda' gu jai' , jir am ɨp na pui' duñia' , dai na ja'xchudhix kam na jax pɨx jir mi' pui' . Ba' gu jaroi' no't bhaan bii nax ja joi'mdat ja palhbui'ñdha' gu ja'tkam tu' na pɨx bhaan , joidham dhox bhai'm taatɨt pui'p ba duiñchu'nda' .

ba' ja'pni bhai' ba ja tɨkka : ― ¿ Aapi'm jam a'm jum tajaa aa gux Dhuudu' kam jix Uañ Ii'mda' na pimɨt pai' dhuuk tɨ jɨɨ'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam ? Ba' gui'p kai'ch am : ― Aach pu cham maat jia nar tu'p tu'm da' gu tu'x Dhuudu' kam jix Uañ Ii'mda' , nach gu' cham pai' jaroi' pu chu'm kɇɇkɇt na pu'ñi ja'k tuch a'gi'ñ .
No' jaroi' maadɨt cham pu bua nach jɨ'k jax kai'ch dhi u'uan ta'm bhaan , jix xi'ɨraam japim xi ñɨidhat cham mi bɨpnatda' na ba' bhaan maachidhat jix xi'ɨraidha' ɨp dɨɨlh .
Ja'pniñ kai'ñkam jup jam tɨtdañ jaaduñ nach cham tu' pu chu'm jimia' buiñor gu Dios na pai' dhɨr jir gɇ'kam nach jax chu'm ya' oipo xib , cham tu' bɨnkam dhich bakxi' ni dhich a'oo .

Moo pim cham gam ɨrdat oipoda'ñ jaaduñ . Xim ga'ngada' pim na pim jax ja'k duuji bia'ka' gu koi' na cham tu ju'ngɨ , cham tu' na pim dai bhaan tɨtɨɨ'ñchoka' gu koi' na ampɨx tu ju'ngɨ na kɨ'n jum guguuxi'ñ dhi jam tutku' . Gu' ja'pji na pim xim ga'ngada' ji na jax ja'k gammɨjɨ jam a'm ba tɨ nɨidhidha' guñ Gɨ'kora' na pim ba' ba bia'ka' gu koi' gui' na cham tu ju'ngɨ . Aañi' dho tu maak no' jaroi' soi'm ɨlhdhat jiñ chaan , nat gu' pui'ñ chɨɨdak bhañ joot guñ Gɨ'kora' .

Gio ji na gu' sia ku pim tɨi taan gu Dios na jam makia' gu tu' na pim jix aa'nda' na pim bia'ka' , cham tu'p jam maakda' , na gu'x bhai'x maat ka' na pim bhaan pɨx gɇ'gɇrkam jum taat ka' gio na pim kɨ'n bɨɨx aixim jix chu duñiik ka' na jax ja'k cham kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ , cham tu' na pim kɨ'n jix bhai'm duukam jup tu buada' .
Gammɨjɨ pim taxchaabgi'ñdha' gu Dios jich Gɨ'kora' na bɨxchu' pɨx kɨ'n jix bhai'ch bua , bhaankam japim taxchaabgi'ñdha' gu Gɇ'kam jich Xoi'kam .
Pui'm duu gu' bɨjɨk gu Abraam , nat tu' sɨlhkam tɨ jɨɨ'ñ pɨx buiñor gu Dios , pui' kut ba' gu Dios bhammɨ dɨr bha ja'k pui'p tɨɨ nar jix kɨɨ' maa'nkam .

Ba' cham tu' kam aa' gu tu' na tu tonni'ñ ka' bɨɨx kap na jɨ'x jir gɇ' kiicham , pui' na jax gu tanoolh gio gu masaa'n , na gu' gu Dios na bhai' daa joidham gɇ' tanoor , bɨɨx kap tu tonni'ñ na jɨ'x jir kiicham , gux chu maax jir di' guch Xoi'kam .

Ba' aapi'm jiñ jaaduñ , cham tu' mi' pui' ka tu daa'ñchu' pim na jax jam jurtu'n gu jam tutku' nar ya' kam dhi oi'ñga'n , gu' ja'pji dai na jax pɨx jam jurtudim gux Dhuudu' kam jix Uañ Ii'mdaga'n gu Dios , gui' dho ji no' sɨlhkam jam a'm jup tui'dhi' . Na gu' gu jaroi' no' cham mi' pui' tu daa'ñchu' nat jax ja'k tu jii guch Xoi'kam , cham tu' bhaan jup tui'ñgɨda' gux Dhuudu' kam jix Uañ Ii'mdaga'n gu Dios .

Gu' ba' no' mɨt gu' gu Israel kam ja'tkam mi' pui' jii na jax jix aa' gu Dios , gio dho bhai'p ja tuttu' bhaan gu oliibo nam jir pai' kam , na gu' gu Dios bɨxchu'x bhaai' na pu tu duñia' , pu cham tu' tu' jɨbo'xchu'n .
Cham pai' dhuuk tu' bhaan jum ua'tulhdhak jamɨt , ni na mɨt cham pai' dhuuk iatda' tu a'gak .

Na gu' aañ dai jia nañ mi' pui' jim nat jax ja'k tu dai xib gu Dios gui' nam pui'p daanɨt gux io'm bɨjɨk dɨr kam jich bopxi kat , na gu' dai nax aa' nach jix bhai' mi' pui' jiimda' na jax ja'k jix kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ . Dhi' ba'r di' gu xibkam boi nam ja'p ɨlhii'ñ dhi' nam xiñ bhaamki'ñ nach dɨɨlh pɨx pu tu bua nach jax ɨlhii'ñ nach jɨ'k maap jich dhaa' . Gu' matgɨm aañ jix maat ji na jax ja'k tu aagix na mɨt tu ua'nak gui' nam bɨjɨk bhaankamu'n tu a'gimɨk gu Dios , ba' mi' pui' tu daa'ñchu' iñ dho .

Gio dɨɨlh japim cham tu'm u'ua'tu'nda' , xim nanamkidhat japim . Gu jaroi' no' pim jix joi'mdat nɨi'ñ , jix bhai' pim xi dhuñia' na pim ba' dhi' bhaan cham tu' ka ua'tu'nda' . Na gu' gu jaroi' no'ch jix joi'mdat nɨi'ñ , ja'p ji buusanda' nach ua'tu'nda' . Gu' ba' no'ch jix ja joi'mdat pu'ñix bhai' ja bua gu ja'tkam , dhi' bhaan pui' bam kai'ch na chich bɨɨx pui' ba duu gu jai' na jax ja'k jup tu aagix .

Tɨi pup koi mɨt kɨ'n gu tanoolh nat ja a'm ton , na gu' giilhim jix choiñ , gu' ji na gu' ni jɨ'x ku mɨt iam soi' ba jim ɨlh buiñor gu Dios sia ku jax ja tulhiiñchu'n . Jano' mɨt dho ba' giilhim bhaak ji buiñor , bɨɨx aixim bhai' ji ai'chux jamɨt na jax cham kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ . Cham pai' na mɨt iam soi'm ɨlhdhak ba tu daanɨ buiñor ku cham ka ja tulhiiñchu'nda' gɨt .
Ba' bɨɨx xikoolh dhɨr tɇ'kob kuup gu gɇ' kiicham , mambhɨɨx gok kap ba'r kiki'ñgob , bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n kap ba' bha ua'ñix nam jax chɨɨ' gu mambhɨɨx gook gu maamra'n gu Jakob .

Gu' ba' guch Xoi'kam mi' dhɨr jich boosolh nach pai' cham jɨ'xdha' mi' pui' jimia' , mi' dhɨr jich boosolh nat pai' gu Dios pui' ba tɨ'ɨɨk nach jich chulhiiña' gɨt , nach gu' cham tu' bɨɨx mi' pui' tu duñiidha' na jɨ'k jax tu aagix ka' . Guch Xoi'kam ba' ja'p ji buus nat dɨɨlh mi' ja'k ji bii , jich a'mkam ba' cham bhai' tu jii . Na gu' ja'pnip tu ua'ñix ja'p iam mi' na pai' tu daa na jax ja'k tu aagix : “ Gu jaroi' na bhaan mukia' gu u'uux na gai bɨɨt , dhi' bhaan jix maatɨ' ka' nat gɇ'kam kɨ'n jix buam tu duu . ”

Jix maat japim dho nañ aañ jax jir tu'm kat nañ chakui buiñor tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhat guch Xoi'kam , nañ mi' pui' ka tu daa'ñchu'nda' nam jɨ'k jax tu jim gu Israel kam ja'tkam gui' nam cham tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam . Jix bhaamut jañ ja gaagidha' gui' nam tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ , jix ja koodaktu'nda' iñ .

Ba' daagɨk xi buupra kɨ'n gu baiñum tɨrbiñ gux bhangɨm , nar di' pɨx gu ja'ook na ja'p tu'm tu tuuku' na gu tɨrook dai na gɇ' , jir di' pɨx ɨp gu ko' gui' na bɨjɨk dɨr bax jai'ch , kuupa' ba' buuplhix kam mambhɨɨx jix cha'tmam oo'm ( 1000 ) oidha' juugɨt .

Ba' moo maa'n mi'p kioka' gu maa'nkam Simoon tɨɨgim nax jiboiñara' ka' nat bɨɨpɨ' dɨr pui' ja'k jum mamtuxdhak . Ba' mui' ja'tkam ba ja iatgidhak gu mi' kam Samaaria na pui' ja tɨtdada' nam gɇ'kam kɨ'n daasa' .

Ba' xib dai nañ jix io'm jix maachim na jax pɨk ja'k tu jim guch Xoi'kam . Jix aa' iñ nañ ja'xbui' pui' bɨxchu'p jix chu aichu'nda' na jax gui' nat dɨɨlh duadɨk giop buus mu dɨr koi'ñga'n tɨr na mɨt tɨi yaas . Ja'xbui' pui'p jix aa' iñ nañ jiñ chulhiiña' nat jax jum tulhii gui' , gio pu chu'm kɨ'n jup jix aa' iñ nam jiñ bhaamkidhaiñ mu'aa' na mɨt jax chu'm kɨ'n bhaamkidhak mua ,

Gu jaroi' nap bax dhaasam ka' na bɨɨpɨ' dɨr kɨɨkat ja aagi'ñdha' gu ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios guch Xoi'kam jɨɨgi'ñdham , bɨɨpɨ'p xi nɨi'ñdha' no'x joojoi'ñ na mi' pui' jim na jax jix aa' gu Dios . Na gu' no't jax dhuukat cham mi' pui' ka jii , aap jum a'm ji chɨ gɨxia' . Dai gux kɨɨ'p jum duukam jap bhaan jum tukgi'ñka' nap xip tu duñiidha' .

Gio gu u'uub nap saak pui'p ja darsa' nam tu ja a'gi'ñdha' ɨp gu jai' u'uub , jum aa' sia nam pui' ja'k jup tu jimda' na jax jix kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ gu Dios . Cham jir am nam nai' bɨɨx aixim tu'm tu a'gidha' na tu' cham jir sɨlhkam , ni kum cham jix buam ja a'gada' gu ja'tkam , ni kum cham jix maik ka' . Gu' ja'pji nam jix bhai' tu jimda' nam ba' pui'p ji ja nɨidhat mi' pui'p tu daa'ñchu'nda' gu jai' .
Jir am ba' gu jaroi' no't bɨɨma'n tu kiicha' gu ubii gu jax chu'm na bax mat ka' , gu' pɨx ji na gu'x io'm jir am gu jaroi' no'r dɨɨlhdhɨm .

Ku gu' dhi'm aa' ji na pim tu' sɨlhkam mi' pui' xi dhuiñchu'nda' na jɨ'k moo jax jum kai'ch gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios , cham tu' daipu' na pim jix mat ka' pɨx . Na gu'r ba pui' pɨx ɨp sia pim tɨix maat no' pim gu' cham pu bua na jax jum kai'ch , dɨɨlh japim ua'tulhdhara' tɨr jum iabuda' , na pim gu' cham am buatgɨda' .
Bhai' ba' pu oirɨda' gu Jesuus Galilea , cham jimmɨda' bhammɨ ja'k Judea , na gu'x maat nam bhai' ga'ngada' gu gɇ'gɇrkam Israel kam nam jix chu chiañik nam mu'aa' .

Ba' aapi'm taxchaabgi'ñdha' gu Dios nat xi jam joi'mdak jam a'm tɨ tɨɨgɨk ya ja'k ba jam aich na pai' guch Xoi'kam , dhi' na jaroi' bhaankam tuch mattu'n bɨɨx aixim gu Dios , gam na dhi' bhaankam jix bhai' tuch jimda' , gam nach bhaankam jix bhai'ch chaat ka' . Nat gu' dhich Xoi'kam bhaankam jich boosolh gu Dios mi' dhɨr na pai' cham bhai' tuch jimdat .
bhai' ji ja bopkoñ gu ja tooton gu noonbi'ñ , dai nat jax ja'aa ta'm tua gu suudai' , gu jannulh kɨ'n ba' xi ja gakii'ñxidhidhat gui' nat bha ja'p xi buraak jurban .
Ba' bɨɨpɨ' dɨr giilhim jix ja bhaamki'ñdha' iñ gui' nam jɨ'k pu'ñi tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdha' buiñor guch Xoi'kam , gui' na ja'p ji buusan nar xibkam gu boi , ja da'ngɨt jañ ja kukpada' gu chichio'ñ gam u'uub .
Ba' cham maa'n ñi'ook jup bua am nam tɨi xi chu a'ga , nam gu' jai' tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ nar sɨlhkam na gu Jesuus jir di' guch Xoi'kam , jai' gu'x bhaamut pɨx kɇɇ am ji ,

Ja'p jañ ba'p xi jam tɨɨdam jiñ jaaduñ na pim bhaan bax kaapak gu ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios , na pim joidham jix bhai'm taatɨt mui' xim guguuxdhatgɨda' na pim ja aagi'ñdha' guch Xoi'kam jɨɨgi'ñdham gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios . Ja'p ji buusnia' na pim ja bipia'da' , nam gu' ja'p ji buan nam jir jam kakaasnira' . Ku gu' cham tu' ji na pim bhaan pɨx jix mai'chik ka' gu tuumiñ ku pim ba'm dakoo'ñdhatgɨda' na pim ja aagi'ñdha' , sia ku pim jix oo'n no' pim gu' cham joojoi'ñ gu pui' ja'k . Gu' ja'pji na pim joidham jix bhai'm taatɨt ji , dɨɨlh pɨx na pim joidham jix aa'nda' na pim pu'ñi ja'k bhaankamu'n tu juanda' guch Gɨ'kora' .
Gu ua'tulhdhara' pɨx kɨ'n tu koo'n gu muuki' , ba' gu ua'tulhdhara' dhi' bhaan jup tu da'ngɨ na jɨ'k jax tu aagix nam tui'ñgɨt mi' pui' jiimda' gu ja'tkam .

Daman gu jam tujuandam tuk japim pui' pu cham ja namkidha' pai'jɨ , sia kum alh tɨix bhai' bua nam jam ɨxii'ñdha' gio nam tu orda' . Tu' pɨx ja ɨlhii'ñdha' pim , ni jɨ'x ku pim jix ja joi'gɨ'nda' . Ku ba' gu' na gu' gu Dios jix bhai' ja kɇɇ nam gɇ'kam kɨ'n tɨi soi'm ɨlhii'ñ buiñor na pim ja tulhiiñchu'n , gui' ba' dɨɨlh jup bax maat na jax dhui ja palhbuidha' ,

Ba' aapi'm jiñ jaaduñ , mi' pim pui' xi jiimɨt na jax jix aa' guch Gɨ'kora' , cham tu' na pim pui' pɨx xim tɨɨtgat na pim jir jich Xoi'kam jɨɨgi'ñdham pu cham tu' ka'm nɨi'ñdha' na jax jix aa' , sia ku pim gu' pui' tɨi xi chu bua nam jax ja'k bhaan pui' jam ɨlhii'ñdha' gu ja'tkam na pim jir jich Xoi'kam jɨɨgi'ñdham . Gu' ja'pji na pim sɨlhkam tu' ka'm nɨi'ñdha' ji . Cha'pim bɨɨx aixim jix buam jum duukam kap tu buada' , ni ku pim cham jum i'iatgi'ñdhat , sɨlhkam japim tu a'gada' . Ni ku pim cham tu' ka jɨɨgak ka' maa'n no' tu' bia' , gam na pim cham nai' ka tu a'gada' .

Gu ubii no' tɨ bɨɨna' , ja'p ji buusanda' nam maap buupulh ka' daim bɨpnagɨm nam jɨ'x duduaka' . Ba' no't gu chio'ñ ma muu , ja'p ji buusnia' nam bam do'ñcho' . Mi' dhɨr ba'x bhaai' na gu ubii jumai oidhai gu chio'ñ bɨɨma'n ba tu kiicha' , dai na pui'p tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdha' buiñor guch Xoi'kam .

Maakam sap pɨx ba tu a'ga am na jax cham jir sɨlhkam , ja'p sap kai'chdha' am na cham jɨ'xkat gio mi'p ka baapkia' guch i'ii'mda' bhaan guch chutku' nach ba' gio duduadɨip baapmigia' . Mui'm sap pui' ja'k bhaan ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ nam jax ja aagi'ñ .

Na gu' aach nach bax maat nach buiñor jup tui'dhi' guch Xoi'kam , jich a'm tɨ nɨidhim sia kuch cham kach matgilhi'ñ . Na gu' guch Xoi'kam cham tu' dhi' bhaan jich a'm tɨ nɨidhidha' no'ch matgilhdhix piam ku gu' cham , gu' ja'pji no'ch tu' sɨlhkam buiñor tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhat xich jajoi'gɨ'n .

Gu' ba' nat gu' cham jɨ'xdha' pai' dhuuk tu' bhaan jum ua'tulhdhak buiñor gu Dios , bɨɨx mi' pui' tu kuugalh na jax jix aa' , ba' pui' ja'k duu gu Dios nar am na ja a'mkam mukia' gu ja'tkam , na tu ja namkixdha' gu ja ua'tulhdhara' , na ba' mi' dhɨr pu'ñi duuji bax bhaai'n ka' nam jimia' jix dhaam nam pai' gammɨjɨx jɨjɨkgɨm bap tui'ka' , gui' dho ji nam jɨ'k soi'm ɨlhdhai tɨ jɨɨ'ñdha' buiñor gio nam mi' pui' jimia' na jax jix aa' .

Ba' ja'p jañ jup xi jam tɨɨdam jiñ jaaduñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan , na pim jumpada' gu tuumiñ na pim ja makia' gu jai' nam pui'p tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam gui' nam Jerusaleen oi'dha' . Pui' pim ja'k duñia' nañ jax ja aagi'ñ gu jai' nam pui'p tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam nam jɨ'kchi kap jum jumpadat jup tu daan na jɨ'x Galaasia bhaan bipio' gu dɨbɨɨr .
Gu u'uub gui' nam tɨ bɨpna' , jum aa' nam tu' ka'm ja nɨi'ñdha' gu ja bɨpna' , pui' nam jax tu' ka'm nɨi'ñ guch Xoi'kam .

Ba' gio bhai'p ji chu ja a'gi gu Jesuus gu ja'tkam , jup ja tɨtda : ― Aañ jir di' gui' na joidham gɇ' tanoor ya' dhi oi'ñga'n . Gu jaroi' na bañ kaichgɨda' , cham tu'x chukgam kɨr kap tui'ñgɨda' . Joidham jix chu maax kɨr ba oirɨda' , na gu' ba machia' na jax ja'k mi' pui' jimda' na jax jix aa' guñ Gɨ'kora' .
Tɨ'ñchokat japim jiñ jaaduñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan nam jax tu jam a'gidhimɨk gu noonbi'ñ gu Gɇ'kam jich Xoi'kam ,

Ni na cham tu' a'miram jum aa' na mu pai' palhbui'ñdha' gu jaroi' gu tu' no' jax jix dhuñiim , na gu' dhi' pɨx jir di' nach maak gu ii'mda' bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n , pui' na jax gu jɨbɨɨlh nach kɨ'n iibhɨ , gio bɨɨx aixim na tu'ch a'm jum aa' .

Na gu' ja'pni jia na jax ba' gu jaroi' no' ya'ni ja'p pai' kɨɨkat jax tuñ a'gi'ñ , nañ gu' joidham pɨx jix dhappaam jɨɨgi'ñdha' no' jax kai'ch . Gu' dhi' gi ba' na Dios jir ñio'ki'ñ , pu moo jano' ji nach joidham kɇɇji ba tɨ jɨɨ'ñdha' no'm pui' ba tuch a'gi'ñ , nam gu' pui'ch chɨtdaidha' na guch Xoi'kam Dios jir Maraa'n nat bha joot bhammɨ dɨr jix dhaam . Dhi ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios gɇ'p jum duukam bhaan tu a'ga , cham tu' tu' palhɨɨp jup jum duukam .
Gu ja'pji nach gammɨjɨ mi' pui' xi jiimda' na jax jix aa' guch Xoi'kam . Cha'ch jich dho'ñchoka' na jax jich jurtu'nka' gux buam jum duukam , na gu' dhi' dai nach bach ua'tulhdha' no'ch mi jɨɨgi'ñ .

Gio gatuuk nam mummu ja'k jup ba tu kokda na pai' Jerikoo tɨ tɨɨ' , dɨɨlh pɨx nai' ji ia'rɨ gu bhibhii'ñbak , dai na mɨt bɨɨx xikoolh dhɨr pɨx xi jii sakaalh gu Israel kam ja'tkam xijum gook tanoolh juugɨt , nam gu' bɨɨx ja jujur kɨ'n jix biiñaktu'nda' buiñor gu Dios , pui' kut ba' gui' pɨx jup tu duu .
Ba' joidham jix kɨɨ'p jum duukam jix bhai' xi chu buada' gu Paablo , na gu' palhbui'ñdha' gu Dios , na gu' bhaan tɨ nɨidhidha' .
Ba'p ja tɨtda gu Jesuus : ― Tu' sɨlhkam jañ ya' jam aagi'ñdha' , bɨɨx gui' nam jɨ'k jum ua'tulhi'ñ , dhi' kat pui' bam kai'ch nam dai pɨx bha nɨidhim gu ua'tulhdhara' na mu ja'k ja tukgi'ñ .

Dho jaiñ na jax pɨk jir jix bhai'kam gu Dios , gɇ'kam kɨ'n xich joi'gɨlh nach mai' ba suulhgix kat . Aach ba' mi' pui'p xi chu daa'ñchu'nda'ñ jaaduñ na jax gui' , joidham jach xich jajoi'gɨ'nda' bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n .

Gio nat gu'ñ aa'ñ na jax ja'k jir am nañ mi' pui' jimda' nañ ba' gammɨjɨx kɨɨ' boi cha'm bhɨichgɨda' , ba' gammɨjɨ gɇ'kam kɨ'n jix bhai'ñ chaat ka' iñ , nañ gu' pui' xiñ aa'nda' nach maap jup tui'dhi' .
Ba' ampɨk nañ aañ mu aaya' , aap ka ja jiñkaixi'ñdha' guch Xoi'kam jɨɨgi'ñdham gu ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios na tu ua'ñix , xi ja guguuxi'ñdha' ap nam mi' pui' jimia' na jɨ'k jax jum kai'ch .

Cham tu'ch ba' bhaan jich o'jolhdhat nai' xi chu a'gichu' sia pui' jich chulhiiñat bɨɨx aixim , nach gu'x maat nach cham tu' gammɨjɨ puch chulhiiñdha' . Pui' na jax xib sia kuch jix buam jich aa' na cham bhai' tuch jim , cham tu'ch xi' kam jix aa' nax bhai' ba tuch jimda' .
Ba' jai' maakam jup ja ai'chuxi'ñ am , jup kai'ch am : ― Ja'pji nam jix maikut jup kai'ch ji dhi ja'tkam .

Gui' na bɨɨx xikoolh dhɨr kɨ'n kuup gu gɇ' kiicham , jix a'bhar joodai kɨ'n bha bhi'ñbakchix na bɨɨx aixim tu'm totbik gio nax dha'ram namɨɨk , gu' ba' gu ba'bhak na ɨrban dɨr tuut , jix uam totbikdam nax dha'ram namɨɨk kɨ'n jup duñiix , na joidham ja'k dɨr jix chu maax .

Ba' bhɨjɨ dɨr bhai' ji bubua mɨt xijum gook gu noonbi'ñ gu Dios nam pu chu'm kɨ'n dalhxix nam ja tulhiiñchuda' gu ja'tkam bɨɨx aixim bhaan bɨɨx kap na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n . Jix chooto tɨ tɨi'chu' am bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n , jix kɨkɨɨ' ji gu'x u'uañ gu ja jajannulh , gio nar jix dha'ram namkɨm , ko'kmarak bhibhispara' nar jix uam totbikdam jam bha ja'p jup xi chu buupratu' ja bhabhaastu am .

Gio gui' nam xi jam bhaamkidhat xi jam koodak ka' , cha'pim pui' kai'chdha' na gɨt iam tu' na pɨx ja duñia'x buam jum duukam , ja'kbui' kat ji na pim tu ja daañxi'ñdha' na gɨt jix bhai' tu ja jimda' .

Gio gu tootna'n jix io'm jix mɨmɨim ja'p na jax tui'ka' gu baiñum no' tai chɨr baaxich , na giilhim bax mɨim ka' nax io'm bax choiñ ka' . Ba' na xi chu a'ga , giilhim gɇ'x kaidha' , am tɨroon , ja'p na jax kai'chdha' gu suudai' pai' no' gɇ' mɨr na pu'ñi am tɨroonda' na sasbakda' .

Bɨɨx jañ ba ja aagi'ñ nap jax jir tu'm kam jiñ Gɨ'kora' gam nap jir tu'p tu'm da' , pui' na pich jɨ'k jax jiñ chɨɨ'n . Gio nañ jup ja tɨtda na sia ku ñich ba jii aañ ya' dɨr , bha jootsa' iñ jumai nañ a'mkam ya' ja guguuxi'ñdha' gam na ja mattu'nka' nam jax ja'k mi' pui' jiimda' nap jax jix aa' , nam ba' mi' dhɨr ja'p ja'k pui'p jix ja joi'gɨ'nda' gu jai' ja'p nap jax xiñ joi'gɨ'n aañ .

Nat gu' gu Dios cham tu' xich dhai' gu Maraa'n , gu' ja'pji nat cham jax ji chɨ'ɨɨk tu maa nat ba' ya'ch a'mkam muu na ba' mi' dhɨr jix bhai' ba tuch jimda' pu'ñi . Gu' ba' nat cham jich dhai' gu Maraa'n , dhi' bhaan jix maatɨ' ɨp na bɨxchu'ch a'm jup tu tu'ii' bɨɨma'n gu Maraa'n .

nam jup jam tɨtda bo na saak pu'ñi na pai' dhuuk ba miamlhia' na tum kuugalhdha' ya' dhi oi'ñga'n , mui' bhai' ji jai'chdhɨlhia' am gu ja'tkam nam pu'ñi bɨɨx aixim tu buada' nam dɨɨlh jax ɨlhii'ñdha' , gio gam nam bɨɨx aixim xi ja ai'chuxdhat tu' pɨx ja ɨlhii'ñdha' gui' nam bhaankamu'n tɨi tu a'gada' guch Gɨ'kora' .

Ku pim ji gu' cham tu' jax jum aa'nda' ji na pim aapi'm jix io'm jir jix kɨkɨɨ' ja'tkam ku mɨt ba' bhai' jam tuttu bhaan gu oliibo , gu' ba' gui' na pɨk jir mamraga'n jamɨt ja ɨ'kɨ nam cham jir kɨkɨɨ' , na pim gu' dhi' bhaan gɇ'gɇrkam bam taat ka' . Gu' ba' no' pim gu' pui'm aa' , dai na pim xi chɨ'ñchoka' na pim cham tu' dɨɨlh dudua , gu' ja'pji gu takaa'n gu oliibo na mu jam maak ii'mda' na pim ba' kɨ'n dudua , na gu' gui' mi' pu tu tak .

Cham jir am gu' nach moop jam chian na pim mi' pui' jimia' , gu' ja'pji dɨɨlh na pim mi' pui' xi dhuñia' cham jax ji kai'chɨt , na pim gu' tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam . Aach dai nach mu jam palhbui'ñ pɨx na pim jax ja'k jix io'm jix bhai'm taatɨt buiñor tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdha' guch Xoi'kam .
Ba' bhammɨ baasɨ'n dɨr na pai' Betaania tɨ tɨɨ' , bhai'x ka'ook ka' maa'n gu maa'nkam Laasar tɨɨgim , nar ja'nni'ñ gu Mariiya gio gu Maarta .

Pu'jani nax abhaaruix . Gu jaroi' na tu' pɨx ɨlhii'ñdha' dhi' nañ jɨ'k jax kai'ch na jax jim aagɨt na maa'nkam jup jir dunii'ñ , cham tu' gu jax chu'm maa'nkam na cham kɨɨgalhi'ñdha' , gu' ja'pji gu Dios nat jam a'm tajaa gux Dhuudu' kam jix Uañ Ii'mda' .

Jix maatɨ' ka' am jia gui' nam sɨlhkam Dios jir tujuandam tugi'ñ gio gui' na cham . Gui' nam sɨlhkam Dios bhaankamu'n tu a'ga , pui' ja'k kai'chidha' am nat guch Xoi'kam maa'nkam jup jum duuk ya' ai dhi oi'ñga'n bhaan .

Ba' dhi' dhi ja'tkam nañ jaroi' ja aa' na mɨt bha ja'p maakam ba ji jam iatgi , pu'ñi ja'k jup tu ja dooda' , na mɨt gu' pui' gɇ'p bam ua'tulh bɨxchu' bhaan , gam nam pui' kai'chɨt oipo na cham tu'r jich Gɇ'kam tuk guch Xoi'kam . Gio gu' cham tu' ka'm nɨi'ñ am pui' xi kai'chɨt , daman tu' pɨx ja ɨlhii'ñ am gui' nam ya ja'p jir gɇ'gɇrkam . Sia gu noonbi'ñ gu Dios gampai' pɨx ja bia' am , dai nam giilhim xi ja ai'chuxdhat , nam gu' ja'p moo tu' nam pɨx bhaan gɇ'gɇrkam jum taat ka' .

Gio ba' na cham tu' bɨɨx aixim jix buam ka tu buada' na jax cham kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ gu Dios , gu' ja'pji dai ji na pɨx bhaan ji bamgidha' nax bhai'm duukam bap tu buada' na jax jix aa' , na ba' pu'ñi duuji gammɨjɨ cham tu' bhaan jax jim aagɨt jix jɨkgɨm bap tui'ka' , gammɨjɨ na pu'ñi ja'k duiñchu'nda' , cham tu' pai' pɨx .

Ba' no' pim gu' aapi'm jix aa' na pim buiñor aaya' , dai na pim mi' pui' xi jiimda' tu' sɨlhkam tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhat buiñor guch Xoi'kam , maa'n na pim jax mi' pui' tu daa'ñchu'nda' na pimɨt jax ja'k kai gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ guch Xoi'kam , na mɨt tu jam a'gi na bhaan tu a'ga na pim jax ja'k dui cham mu ja'k bhɨɨya' na pim pai' gammɨjɨ mi' pup jum tulhiiñdha' . Dhi' jɨ' ji pu chu'm dhix bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ guch Xoi'kam na bɨɨx kap nai' tum a'ga na jɨ'x jir oi'ñga'n . Ba' aañi' Paablo dhi' pu chu'm kɨ'n jup ja palhbui'ñ gu jai' nam nai' tu a'ga , aañ pui'p tu a'gichu' .

Ba' giilhim bhaak jamɨt nat pui' xi ja tɨɨ'n . Jotmoda' tɨi u'aam jamɨt gu joodai nam sap kɨ'n ma'yasai mu'aa' gɨt . Gu' ji nat gu' mɨjɨ ja'p xi baa ja'tkam tɨr gu Jesuus , pu jii mi' dhɨr gɇ' chiop . Mi ja'p ba buus ja saagi'ñ , gammɨjɨ ji dhuu .

Bar jai' ja'tkam ka' pim , cham tu' pu chu'm kia' na jax gu bɨɨpɨ' dɨr kam . Jix u'uañ kɨ'n japim xi gu'kgɨda' pui' na jax jir tu'm gu Dios , na ba' dhi' bhaan jix maatɨ' ka' nat gui' jam pataasak jai'p jam duu . Mi' pui' pim ba jiimda' na jax ja'k sɨlhkam jir mi' pui' .

Ba' gui' nam jɨ'k tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam , jum aa' nam nakga' siat pu'ñix io'm bhai' ji ja tulhiiñchuda gu ja'ook , dai nam mi' pui' xi chu kuugalhdhidha' pɨx na jax jix aa' gu Dios . Dhi' ba' bhaan ba matgilhia' nam sɨlhkam bɨɨx ja jujur kɨ'n jix biiñak buiñor guch Xoi'kam .
Ku ba' gu' gatuuk giop dua'ñ ji gu Dios .
Aañ jir di' pɨx ɨp gux kɨɨ' bipia'dam nañ gammɨjɨ ba ja nuuka'nda' guñ kakasnira' , cham jax bua sia ñich pui' ma muu nañ tɨi pup xi ja palhbuidhimɨi no't tu' ba ji ja oi .
Bax maat japim dho nat gu Dios pɨx pu chu'm kɨ'n jiñ dhai nañ pu'ñi jam aagi'ñdha' nat tu' bhaan xich joi'mdak jix bhai'ch dhuu , pui' nat jax pu tɨi bɨjɨk na tu duñia' .

No' jaroi' maadɨt mi' pai' maakam ja aagi'ñ guch Xoi'kam jɨɨgi'ñdham , dɨlhkob jap xi baidhai xi chu a'gidha' na cham jir am na jax ja'k tu jim . Ba' no' cham jum jɨɨgi'ñ , ja'p jap tɨɨda' na buusnia' mi' dhɨr ja bui guch Xoi'kam jɨɨgi'ñdham , cham tu' na mi' oirɨt maakam ja aagi'ñdha' .
Ba' gu gɇ'gɇrkam Israel kam cham maa'n ñi'ook kap duuk am na mɨt pui' jɨ' kai na kai'ch gu Jesuus , nam gu' jai' dhɨt tɨi pɨx am tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ .

nam gu' cham tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ na jax kai'ch gu Dios bhaan gu u'uan ta'm na tu ua'ñix . No'm gu' moo tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdha' gɨt na jax jum kai'ch , matgam ba tɨ jɨɨ'ñdha'm gɨt ji buiñor gui' nat jix dhaam dɨr bha jii .

Pui' kuñ ba'p jam tɨtdañ jaaduñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan na pim cham jax jim aagit mi' pui' xi jiimda' na jax jix aa' gu Dios cham jim o'jolhdhat , na ba' na pai' dhuuk ya' aaya' guch Xoi'kam , pu jam baidhika' maa'n jimdam , na pim gu' cham tu' bhaan u'ua'tulhdhix ka' .

Palhɨɨp pɨx jañ ba tu jam a'gidha' bhaan dhi u'uan aapi'm jiñ jaaduñ na ba' moo bar daipu' ka' . Jich a'mkam japim tu daanda' buiñor gu Dios na ba' gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ guch Xoi'kam jotmoda' bɨɨx kap aaya' , gio nam ba' cham jax ji chɨ'ji joidham kɇɇji mi' pui' ba jimia' gui' nam kaaya' , ja'p na jax aapi'm na pimɨt cham jax ji chɨ'ɨɨk kɇɇk mi' pui' jii .

Jix maat ich gu' na jax chu'm tanoolh jich dhudua'ñdhaich baapmi'ñdha' nach ba' mi' dhɨr buiñor bap tui'ka' gammɨjɨ , ja'p nat jax dua'ñdhak giop buusai' guch Xoi'kam na ka muukix kat . Bɨɨx maap jich dhudua'ñdhaich baapmi'ñdha' sia aapi'm .

Piam ku gu' jaroi' maadɨt ɇɇ gu jax chu'm kokdai' na kɨ'n jix ka'ook , dai na ja umua'ñdha' dho guch Xoi'kam jɨɨgi'ñdham gui' nam jɨ'k bɨjɨk dɨr ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ nam tu daañxidha' buiñor gu Dios na dua'ñdha' xi juulhdhai am palhɨɨp gu asait .
’ Ba' na pai' dhuuk ba bia'ka' gu Moisees gu gook oo'm oidha' , ma ja paxiaram gu jajaa'nni'ñ Israel kam ja'tkam mu ja'p nam pai' jax oi'dha'ka' .

Mi' dhɨr jañ ba' moo ja'pni ja'k jup xim tɨɨdam na mɨt gu Israel kam ja'tkam ya' daa dhi maa'nkam gio ba' na mɨt ja'p pɨk ba ji mu'aak , gu' ji na ñich gu' aañ mu dai'ññɨk ma palhbui ja bɨɨm guñ sandaarui'x chuk , na ñich gu' pui' ba tɨ kai na dhi' maadɨt jir di' gu ja'tkam tugi'ñ gu gɇ'kam Rooma kam .

Ba' mi' cham bhai' nam jax kam duñia' gu ja'tkam nam jɨ'k mi oi'ñka' na jɨ'x jir gɇ' kiicham , nam gu' cham ka maat na jax pɨk ja'k jir sɨlhkam . Ba' ba daa mɨt gu Gaayo gio gu Aristaarko , gui' nam maap jiim gu Paablo , nam jir bhammɨ dɨr ja'k kam na bhaan bipio' gu Masedoonia dɨbɨɨr . Ja tɨɨbiopak jamɨt gamai' pɨx tu' ja dooda na mɨt ba ja baidhak mu ja'k na pai' mi' pu tum a'gada' .
Iam chi na pim gu' jax chɨ'ya' gɨt na ba do'ñcho' gui' nar jix uañ gio nar jix bhai'kam . Aapi'm gu' dai gu tu' tu mua'kam xi chu chia nam do'ñcho' .

Cham tu' jai' kam ja ɨlhii'ñ gu Dios sia kum cham jir Israel kam ja'tkam , pui' pɨx jup ja ɨlhii'ñ ji matgɨm na jax aach . Dhi' bhaan jix maatɨ' nat pui'p uañchuda gu ja ua'tulhdhara' na mɨt pai' dhuuk tɨ jɨɨ'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam ja'p na jax aach .

Ja'pni ja'k jum aa' na pim tu't tu kua'da' gio na pim tu io'da' : Bɨɨpɨ' pim xi chɨ'ñchoi na pim jax kai'ñkam jugia' gu paan gio na pim jax kai'ñkam i'ya' gu biiñ , na pim pai'x bhai' xi chɨ'ñcho' na jax jir jum duukam ka' na pim ba' ba jugia' gio na pim i'ya' .
Ba' mi' pim pui' xi jiimda' aapi'm jiñ jaaduñ na jax jix aa' guch Xoi'kam . Jix io'm japim bhaankam xi chu juanda' , cham tu'r ja'ppɨx ka' gu' buiñor gu Dios gu tu' na pim jax buada' .
Ba' aañ xib soi' jam tɨtda na pim mi' pui' jimia' nañ jax ja'k tu jim aañ .

Nat gu' gu Dios tɨi pui' tu duu nam jax ja'k machia' gɨt gu ja'tkam na gu Dios bɨxchu'x bhaai' na pu tu duñia' , gu' ji nam gu' pu cham maatɨt tɨ nɨi'ñ . Pui' kut ba' gu Dios jix ja joi'mdak pui' tu duu na dai pɨx no'm tu' sɨlhkam bɨɨx ja jujur kɨ'n ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ na jax jum kai'ch gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ , cham tu' mu ja'k ka bhɨɨya' am nam pai' gammɨ mi' pup jum tulhiiñdha' , sia kum gu' jai' tu' pɨx ɨlhii'ñ .

Gio aapi'm u'uub jiñ jaaduñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan na pim tɨ bɨpna' , jam guguuxi'ñ iñ ɨp na pim siamri tu' ka'm xi ja nɨidhat gu jam bɨpna' na pim maap tu oi'dha' , na ba' gu' no'm jax dhuukat jai' dhɨt cham tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam , saalhiom bhai' ji chɨ jɨɨ'ñdha' am , dai nam xi jam nɨi'ñdha' pɨx no' pim aapi'm joidham jir jix bhabhai'kam ja bui . Cham pɨk jum aa'nda' ba' na pim gammɨjɨ tu ja a'gi'ñdha' gu ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios ,

Bhaankam pɨx nai' tu a'gim ich ba' aach guch Xoi'kam , ja'p ji buusan na gu Dios pɨx dɨɨlh soi' ja tɨtda gu ja'tkam nam tɨ jɨɨ'ñdha' buiñor guch Xoi'kam . Ba' aach xib bhaankam guch Xoi'kam soi' jam tɨtda aapi'm jiñ jaaduñ na pim mi' pui' xi jiimda' na pim ba'x bhai' ji bubuakia' buiñor gu Dios .
Ku ba' gu' gu Dios giop dua'ñ ji , nat gu' dɨɨlh pui' ja'k tu duu na cham mi'm tulhiiñdha' , ba' mi' dhɨr cham jɨ'xkat jax ka dooda' gu muuki' .
Gio nam gu' dhi' ba' pɨk cham kɨɨgalhi'ñ gu ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios na tɨi tum a'ga , tu' pɨx ɨlhii'ñ am gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñi'ook na bhaan tu a'ga guch Xoi'kam gui' nach jaroi' buiñor ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ .

Gio ba' na cham maimmukda' , ni ku cham ja kokdada' gu ja'tkam , gu' ja'pji nar jix bhai'kam ka' pɨx ja bui , jix ja joi'mdat pɨx ja nɨi'ñdha' . Gam na cham tu' bhaan jup jum buixi'ñdha' gu tu' tuumiñ .

Gu' gu suudai' nañ aañ jax chu'm tu maak , cham tu' ka tanoom ka' ji gu jaroi' no't ba ii , na gu' gammɨjɨ pu bhaan ba ba'punda' , na gu' bhaan ba tɨ nɨidhidha' guñ Gɨ'kora' na ba' cham tu' ka tulhiiñchuda' , dai na ba baidhika'x dhaam ja'k .

Gu' matgɨm gu jaroi' no't moo tu' sɨlhkam ba maat na jax jir tu'm kam gu Dios , joidham ji na tu' ka'm nɨidhat mi' pui' jimda' na jax jix aa' . Dhi' ba' bhaan bax maatɨ' ka' na bɨɨx juraa'n kɨ'n ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor , ba' maap bam kɇkɇɇ am gu Dios .

Ba' gu ja'ook na ja'p tu'm tu tuuku' na gu tɨrook dai na gɇ' , gio gu nobii'ñ na pui' giilhim tu'm jup tu tuuku' nax xijum gook tu moom , gio ba' gui' na bhaankamu'n tu a'ga , bhɨjɨ dɨr ji bubua mɨt ja chiichiñ am gu cham kɨkɨɨ' i'ii'mda' ja'p tu'm na sosbha'n ,

Gu' dhi'm aa' ji na pim mi' pui' xi chu daa'ñchu'nda' na jax jum kai'ch mi' pai' u'uan ta'm na tu daaxix gu ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios nap jum kai'ch : “ Jix ja joi'ndat jap jix bhai' ja buada' gu ja'tkam sia jaroi' na pɨx , ja'p nap jax xim joi'ndat jix bhai' buada' aap dɨɨlh . ” Dhi' jɨ' no' pim pu'ñi ja'k duiñchu' na pim ba' bhaan pui' ba ɨlhii'ñdha' na pim mi' pui' bhɨichu' na jax jum kai'ch gu ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios .

Cham tu'ch ja aa'ñdhim gu' gu ja'tkam nach jax jir tu'm kam dɨɨlh , gu' ja'pji nach pui' ja tɨtdaim na guch Xoi'kam bɨɨx jir jich Gɇ'kam tuk . Gio gu' pui' pɨx jich ɨlhii'ñ ich jam bui nach jir tu jam juandam tuk , nach gu' xi jam joi'gɨ'n bhaankam guch Xoi'kam .

Chaam tu' ji nar pui'ñ jaaduñ , cha'pim nai' pɨx ja jɨɨgi'ñdha' gu jai' jax nam kai'chdha' . Na gu' maaxik jir pui' na saak jax kai'ch maa'nnim gu jaroi' , na cham jir kɨɨ' no'ch ja bɨɨm jiim gui' nam maakam ɨlhii'ñdha' gu tu' , no'ñ gu' aañ tɨi pui' ja'k ɨlhii'ñ na jax jir mi' pui' , cham tu' ba' pui' ji chu buusnia' nañ jax tɨi ɨlhii'ñdha' .

Ba' gu Gɇ'kam Dios gui' nat dua'ñdhak giop bamii' guch Xoi'kam mu dɨr koi'ñga'n tɨr , gui' na xib pui' ji buusan nar jix kɨɨ' bipia'dam , xi jam joi'ndat tu jam uañi'ñka' gu jam ua'tulhdhara' kɨ'n gu ɨ'ra'n nat jaax ,
